yaH sarvaTA sarva hata anDakAraH saMsAra paFkAt jagat ujjahAra / tasmE namaskRtya yaTArTa SAstre SAstram pravakzyAmi aBiDarma koSam
# rgya gar skad du / aa bhi dharmma ko sham bh'a shyam / bod skad du / chos-mngon-pa # 'i mdzod kyi bshad-pa # / 'jam dpal gzhon-nu # r gyur-pa #  la phyag 'tshal lo / gang zhig kun la mun-pa #  gtan bcom zhing / 'khor-ba # 'i 'dam las 'gro-ba #  drangs mdzad-pa # / don bzhin ston-pa #  de-la #  phyag 'tshal nas
SAstram praNetu kAmaH svasya SAstuH mAhAtmya jQApana arTam guNa AKyAna pUrvakam tasmE namaskAram AraBate yaH iti / budDam Bagavantam aDikRtya Aha hatam asya anDakAram anena vA iti hata anDakAraH / sarveNa prakAreNa sarvasmin hata anDakAraH sarvaTA sarva hata anDakAraH / ajQAnam hi BUta arTa darSana pratibanDa ADakAram / tat ca BagavataH budDasya pratipakza lABena atyantam sarvaTA sarvatra jQeye punar anutpatti Darma tvAt hatam / atas asO sarvaTA sarva hata anDakAraH / pratyEkabudDa SrAvakAH api kAmam sarvatra hata anDakArAH / klizwa saMmoha atyanta vigamAt / na tu sarvaTA

# de-yang #  rnam-par-shes-pa # 'i tshogs drug ste / mig gi rnam-par-shes-pa #  nas / yid kyi rnam-par-shes-pa # 'i bar ro
yaH eza vijQAna skanDaH uktaH Ayatana vyavasTAyAm / manaH Ayatanam ca tat
# rnam-par-shes-pa # 'i phung-po #  bstan-pa #  gang-yin-pa #  de skye-mched #  rnam-par-gzhag-pa #  ni / yid kyi skye-mched #  kyang de yin
DAtu vyavasTAyAm saH eva
# khams rnam-par-gzhag-pa #  yang de-dag-nyid #
DAtavaH saspta ca matAH / katame sapta
# khams bdun dag tu'ang 'dod-pa #  ste / bdun gang zhe na
zaX vijQAnAni aTo manaH
# rnam-par-shes-pa #  drug dang yid
cakzuH vijQAna DAtuH yAvat manaH vijQAna DAtu manoDAtuH ca
# mig gi rnam-par-shes-pa'i-khams #  nas yid kyi rnam-par-shes-pa'i-khams #  dang yid kyi khams kyi bar ro
evam atra paQca skanDAH dvAdaSa AyatanAni azwAdaSa DAtavaH nirddizwAH BavaNti
# de-ltar-na #  'dir phung-po #  lnga dang skye-mched #  bcu gnyis dang khams bco brgyad du bstan-pa # r 'gyur te
avijQapti varjyaH rUpa skanDaH daSa AyatanAni daSa DatavaH
# rnam-par-rig-byed #  ma-yin-pa #  ma-gtogs-pa #  gzugs-kyi-phung-po # 'i skye-mched #  bcu dang khams bcu dag go
vedanA dayaH skanDAH trayaH vijQapti saMskRtAni ca Darma Ayatanam DarmaDAtuH ca vijQAna skanDaH manaH Ayatanam zaX vijQAna DAtavaH manaH DAtuH ca iti
# tshor-ba #  la-sogs-pa #  phung-po #  gsum dang rnam-par-rig-byed #  ma-yin-pa #  dang 'dus-ma-byas #  dag ni chos-kyi-skye-mched #  dang chos-kyi-khams #  so / rnam-par-shes-pa # 'i phung-po #  ni yid kyi skye-mched #  dang rnam-par-shes-pa'i-khams #  drug dang yid kyi khams so
nanu ca zaX vijQAna kAyAH vijQAna skanDaH iti uktam / aTa kaH yam punar teByaH nyaH manoDAtuH na Kalu kaScid anyaH / kim narhi / tezAm eva
# rnam-par-shes-pa # 'i tshogs drug ni rnam-par-shes-pa # 'i phung-po # r bshad-pa #  ma yin nam / yang de-dag #  las gzhan-pa #  yid kyi khams de gang zhe na / gzhan ni gang yang med do
zaNNAm anantara atItam vijQAnam yat hi tat manaH / yat yat samanantara nirudDam vijQAnam tat manoDA AtuH iti ucyeta
# 'o na ci zhe na / drug-po #  de-dag # / nyid las 'das ma-thag #  pa yi / rnam shes gang yin de yod do / rnam-par-shes-pa #  gang-dang-gang #  'gags-ma-thag-pa #  de nyid ni yid kyi khams zhes bya ste
tat yaTA saH eva putraH nyasya pitA Bavati tat eva Palam anyasya bIjam iti
# dper-na #  bu de nyid gzhan gyi phar 'gyur-ba #  dang 'bras-bu #  de nyid gzhan gyi sa-bon #  yin pa lta-bu # 'o
evam tarhi dravyataH saptadaSa DAtavaH Bavanti dvAdaSa vA zaX vijQAna DAtu manaH DAtUnAm itaretara antar BAvAt iti kasmAt azwAdASa vyavasTApyante / yadi api evam taTA api / zazWa ASraya prasidDi arTa DAtavaH zAdaH smRtAH
# de lta na 'o na ni rnam-par-shes-pa'i-khams #  drag dang yid kyi khams rnams gcig gi nang-du #  gcig 'dus-pa # 'i phyir rdzas su na khams bcu bdun nam bcu gnyis su 'gyur na ci'i-phyir #  khams bco brgyad du rnam-pa # r gzhag ce na / de lta'ang yin mod kyi / 'on-kyang # / drug-pa # 'i rten ni rab bsgrub phyir
paQcAnAm vijQAna DAtUnAm cakzuH DAtu Ayatana AdayaH paQca ASrayAH / zazWasya manaH vijQAna DAtoH ASrayaH nyaH na asti
# khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod / rnam-par-shes-pa'i-khams #  lnga po dag gi rten lnga ni mig gi khams la-sogs-pa #  yin na drug-po #  yid kyi rnam-par-shes-pa'i-khams #  kyi rten ni gzhan med de
atas tad ASraya prasidDa cyarTa manaH DAtu rUpa dizwaH
# de'i-phyir #  de'i rten rab tu bsgrub-pa # 'i phyir yid kyi khams bstan to
evam ASraya ASrita Alamba nazwka vyavasaTAnAt azwAdaSa DAtavaH Bavanti iti

arhataH tarhi caramam cittam na manaH Bavizyati / nahi tat asti yasya tat asmanantara atItam syAt iti

na / tasya api manaH BAvena avasTita tvAt

# de-la #  phung-po #  dag gis ni 'dus byas thams-cad #  bsdus so /

# gzugs-kyi-phung-po #  dang yid kyi skye-mched #  dang chos-kyi-khams #  kyis chos-rnams #  thams-cad #  bsdus-pa # r rig-par-bya # 'o
sa Kalu eza saMgrahaH yatra kvacid ucyamAnaH veditavyaH / svaBAvena / na para BAvena / kim kAraNam / para BAva viyogataH / viyuktaH hi paraBavena DarmaH
# bsdu-ba #  de ni gang-dang-gang #  nas 'byung yang rung / rang-gi #  ngo-bo-nyid-kyis #  te / gzhan gyi dngos-po # s ni ma-yin-pa # r rig-par-bya # 'o / ci'i-phyir #  zhe na / gzhan gyi dngos dang mi ldan phyir / chos ni gzhan gyi dngos-po #  dang mi ldan no
tasmAt na yena viyuktaH tena eva saMgRhItaH yujyate
# de-lta-bas-na #  gang dang mi ldan bde nyid kyis bsdus-pa # r ni mi rung ste
tat yaTA cakzuH indriyam rUpa skanDena cakzuH Ayatana DAtuByAm ca duHKa samudaya satyAByAm ca saMgRhItam
# dper-na #  mig-gi-dbang-po #  ni gzugs-kyi-phung-po #  dang mig-gi-skye-mched #  dang khams dag dang sdug-bsngal #  dang kun-'byung-ba # 'i bden-pa #  dag gis bsdus te

# dper-na #  bsdu-ba'i-dngos-po-bzhi #  po dag gis 'khor rnams bsdus-pa #  lta-bu #  gzhan gyis gzhan bsdus so zhes-bya-ba #  gang yin ba de ni res-'ga' #  ba yin pa'i phyir brdar-btags-pa #  yin par bya'o
nanu ca ekaviMSatyA DAtuBiH Bavitavyam / cakzuzaH dvi tvAt Srotra GrANayoH ca / na Bavitavyam / yasmAt / jAti gocara vijQAna sAmAnyAt eka DAtu tA / dvitve api cakzuH adInam
# mig dang rna-ba #  dang sna dag gnyis gnyis yod-pa # 'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig-tu #  'gyur-ba #  ma yin nam zhe na mi 'gyur te / 'di-ltar # / mig la-sogs-pa #  gnyis mod kyi / rigs dang spyod yul rnam-pa # r shes / 'dra-ba # 'i phyir na khams gcig nyid

gocara sAmAnyam uBayaH rUpa vizaya tvAt
# spyod yul 'dra-ba #  ni gnyi-ga # 'i yul gzugs yin pa'i phyir ro
vijQAna sAmAnyam uBayoH ekacakzuH vijQAna ASraya tvAt
# rnam-par-shes-pa #  'dra-ba #  ni gnyi-ga #  mig gi rnam-par-shes-pa #  gcig gi rten yin pa'i phyir te
tasmat ekaH eva cakzuH DAtuH
# de-lta-bas-na #  mig gi khams ni gcig pa nyid do
evam Srotra GrANayoH api yojyam
# de-bzhin-du #  rna-ba #  dang sna dag la yang sbyar-ba # r bya'o
SoBA arTam tu dvaya udBavaH
# mdzes bya'i phyir na gnyis 'byung ngo
eka DAtu tve api tu cakzuH AdInam dvayoH saMBavaH ASrayasya SoBA arTam
# mig la-sogs-pa #  khams gcig pa nyid yin yang rten mdzes-pa # r bya-ba # 'i phyir gnyis 'byung ngo
anya TA hi eka cakzuH Srotra aDizWAna eka nAsikA vilasaMBavAt mahat vErupyam syAt iti / uktAH skanDa Ayatana DAtavaH / idam tu vaktavyam kaH skanDa Ayatana DAtvarTaH iti / rASi Aya dvAra gotra arTAH skanDa Ayatana DAtavaH / yat kiQcid rUpam atIta anAgata pratyutpannam ADyAtmi bAhyam OdArikam vA sUkzmam vA hInam vA praNItam vA yat vA dUre antike tat sarvam EkaDyam aBisaMkzipya rUprUpa skanDaH iti saMKyAm gacCatI ti vacanAt sUtre rASi arTaH skanDa arTaH iti sidDam / tatra atItam rUpam anitya tA nirudDam / anAgatam anutpannam / pratyutpannam utpanna anirudDam / ADyAtmikam sva asAntAnikam bAhyam anyat AyatanataH vA

OdArikam sa pratiGam sUkzmam apratiGam Apekzikam vA / ApekzikatvAt asidDam iti ced / na / apekzA BedAt / yat apekzyO dArikam na jAtu tat apekzya sUkzmam pitAputra vat / hInam klizwam / praNitama klizwam / dUram atIta anAgatam / antikam pratyutpannam / evam yAvat vijQAnam / ayam tu viSazaH

hInam amanApam praNItam manApam / dUram adRSya deSam / antikam dRSya deSam

nirvacanam tu citta cEttAnAm ayam tanvanti iti AyatanAni / vistRNvanti iti arTaH

gotra arTaH DAtvarTaH

yaTA ekasmin parvate bahUni ayaH tAmra rUpya suvarNa Adi gotrAni DAtavaH ucyante evam ekasmin= ASraye santAne vA azwAdaSa gotrANi azwAdaSa DAtavaH ucyante
# dper-na #  ri 'ga' zhig la lcags dang zangs dang dngul dang gser la-sogs-pa #  rigs mang-po #  dag yod-pa #  la khams zhes brjod-pa #  de-bzhin-du #  rten dang rgyud gcig la rigs bco brgyad dag yod-pa #  la khams bco brgyad ces bya'o

asaMskRtam tarhi na DAtuH syAt / citta cittAnAm tarhi jAti vAcakaH yam DAtu SabdaH iti apare / azwAdaSa DarmANAm jAtayaH svaBAvAH azwAdaSa DAtavaH iti
# 'dus-ma-byas #  khams ma yin bar 'gyur ro zhe na / 'o na ni sems dang sems-las-byung-ba #  rnams yin no / gzhan dag na re chos bco brgyad po dag rigs kyi rang-bzhin #  no zhe na / khams bco brgyad ces bya-ba # s khams zhes-bya-ba # 'i sgra 'di ni rigs kyi tshig yin zhes zer ro

aneka dravya saa samUha tvAt rASi pudgala vat / na

ekasya api dravya paramANoH skanDa tvAt

na tarhi rASi arTaH skanDa arTaH iti vaktavyam / na hi ekasya asti rASi tvam iti / kAryab hAra udvahana arTaH skanDa arTaH iti apare
# de lta na gcig-pu #  la spungs pa nyid med-pa # s spungs pa'i don ni phung-po # 'i don to zhes brjod-pa # r mi bya'o / gzhan dag na re / bya-ba # 'i khur khyer-ba # 'i don nam / yongs su chad-pa # 'i don ni phung-po # 'i don te
pracCeda arTaH vA / taTA hi vaktAraH Bavanti triBiH skanDakEH deyam dAsyAmaH iti / tat etat utsUtram
# 'di-ltar #  smra-ba #  po dbul-ba # r bya-ba # 'i phung-po #  gsum dag tu dbul-ba # r bya'o zhes smra-ba #  bzhin no zhes zer te / de ni mdo dang 'gal lo

pratyekam atIta Adi rUpasya skanDa tvam tatra vijQApyate

sarvam etat atIta Adi rUpam ekaSas rUpa skanDaH iti

na Sakyam evam vijQAtum / tat sarvam EkaDyam aBisaMkzipya iti vacanAt

rUpoIni api tarhi AyatanAni prajQaptisanti prApnuvanti / bahunAm cakzuH Adi paramANUnAm Aya dvAra BAvAt / na / ekaSas samagrANAm kAraNa BAvAt vizaya sahakAri tvAt vA na indriyam pRTak Ayatanam syAt / viBAzAyAm tu ucyate yadi ABiDarmikaH skanDa prajQaptim apekzate / saH Aha paramANuH ekasya DAtoH ekasya Ayatanasya ekasya skanDasya pradeSaH / aTa na apekzate / saH Aha
# de lta na skye-mched #  gzugs-can #  rnams kyang btags-pa'i-yod-pa # r 'gyur te / mig la-sogs-pa # 'i rdul-phra-rab #  mang-po #  ni skye-ba # 'i sgor gyur-pa # 'i phyir ro zhe na / ma yin te tshogs-pa #  rnams re-re-nas #  rgyu'i-ngo-bo # r gyur-pa # 'i phyir ram / yul lhan-cig #  byed-pa #  yin pa'i phyir dbang-po #  las logs-shig #  tu skye-mched #  du yang mi 'gyur ro / bye-brag #  tu bshad-pa #  chen-po #  las ni / gal-te #  chos-mngon-pa #  ba zhig phung-po #  btags-pa'i-yod-pa # r lta na ni de rdul-phra-rab #  khams gcig dang skye-mched #  gcig dang phung-po #  gcig gi phyogs yin no zhes smra'o

# 'on te mi lta na ni de rdul-phra-rab #  khams gcig dang skye-mched #  gcig dang phung-po #  gcig yin no zhes smra'o zhes 'byung ngo
Bavati hi pradeSe api pradeSi vat upacAraH yaTA pawwa eka deSe dagDe pawaH dagDaH iti

kirTam BagavAn skanDa Adi muDena triviDAm deSa nAmA AraBate / Aha / vineyAnAm

moha indriya ruci trEDAt tisraH skanDa Adi deSanAH / trayaH prakArAH trEDam

tri prakAraH kila sattvAnAm mohaH
# sems-can #  rnams kyi rmongs-pa #  ni rnam-pa-gsum #  ste
kecid ca etezu saMmUXAH piNXa Atma grahaNataH
# kha-cig #  ni sems-las-byung-ba #  rnams la ril-po # 'i bdag-nyid #  du 'dzin-pa # s rmongs so

# rtog-pa #  dang bcas dpyod-pa #  dang bcas-pa #  rnams ni du / rtog-pa #  med la dpyod-pa #  tsam dag ni du / rtog-pa #  yang med la dpyod-pa #  yang med-pa #  rnams ni du zhe na
sa vitarkvitarka vicArAH hi paQca vijQAna DAtavaH / nityam ete vitarka vicArAByAm saMprayuktAH / avaDAraNa arTaH hi SabdaH / antyAH trayaH tri prakArAH / manaH DAtuH Darma DAtuH manaH vijQAna DAtuH ca antyAH / ete trayaH tri prakArAH
# rtog dang dpyod dang bcas-pa #  ni / rnam-par-shes-pa'i-khams #  lnga yin /  / 'di dag ni rtag-tu #  rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dag dang mtshungs-par-ldan-pa #  yin te / 'di-ltar #  kha phyi-rol-du #  bltas-pa # 'i phyir rtsing ba yin no / ni zhes-bya-ba #  ni nges-par #  bzung-ba # 'i don to / tha-ma #  gsum ni rnam gsum mo / tha-ma #  dag ni yid kyi khams dang chos-kyi-khams #  dang yid kyi rnam-par-shes-pa'i-khams #  te / gsum po de-dag #  ni rnam-pa-gsum #  ste

# de-la #  yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam-par-shes-pa'i-khams #  dang rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dag las gzhan ba chos-kyi-khams #  mtshungs-par-ldan-pa #  dag dang 'dod-pa'i-khams #  dang bsam-gtan-dang-po #  na ni rtog-pa #  dang bcas dpyod-pa #  dang bcas-pa #  dag yin no / bsam-gtan #  khyad-par-can #  ni rtog-pa #  med cing dpyod-pa #  tsam dag yin no / bsam-gtan-gnyis-pa #  nas-bzung-ste #

# gal-te #  rnam-par-shes-pa # 'i tshogs ba lnga po rnams rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dang bcas-pa #  dag yin na / ji-ltar #  na rnam-par-rtog-pa #  med-pa #  dag ces bya zhe na / nges-par #  rtog dang rjes dran-pa # 'i / rnam-par-rtog-pa #  rnams mi rtog / rnam-par-rtog-pa #  ni rnam-pa-gsum #  mo zhes grag ste

# mig dang rna-ba #  dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam-par-shes-pa'i-khams #  rnams dang yid kyi khams te / sems kyi khams bdun po de-dag #  ni yul 'dzin-pa # 'i phyir dmigs-pa-dang-bcas-pa #  dag go / chos-kyi-skye-mched #  kyang

tatra cakzuH Srotra GrANa jihvA kAyAH pratyutpannAH upAttAH / atIta anAgatAH anupAttAH

# gzhan dag ni ma-zin-pa #  rnams te / 'di-lta-ste #  rtsa ba ma-gtogs-pa # 'i skra dang-ba #  spu dang sen-mo #  dang so dag la yod-pa #  dang phyis dang gcin dang mchil-ma #  dang / snabs dang khrag la-sogs-pa #  dag la yod-pa #  dang sa dang chu la-sogs-pa #  dag la yod-pa #  lta-bu # 'o

# zin-pa #  zhes-bya-ba # 'i don ci zhe na / phan-pa #  dang gnod-pa #  dag gis phan tshun mthun-par-byed-pa # 'i phyir sems dang sems-las-byung-ba #  rnams kyis rten gyi dngos-po # r nye-bar-gzung-ba #  ste / 'jig-rten #  gyi na sems-pa #  dang bcas-pa #  zhes brjod-pa #  gang-yin-pa # 'o / khams nga dag gcig ni 'byung-ba # 'i ngo-bo-nyid #  yin / du dag gcig ni 'byung-ba-las-gyur-pa #  yin zhe na / reg-bya #  rnam-pa-gnyis #  yin te / 'byung-ba #  dag dang 'byung-ba-las-gyur-pa # 'o / de-la #  'byung-ba #  dag ni bzhi'o

# de-dag #  kyang reg-bya #  yin pa'i phyir ro

# dge slong sgra ni phyi'i skye-mched #  yin te / 'byung-ba-chen-po-bzhi #  dag rgyur-byas-pa #  gzugs-can #  bstan du med la thogs-pa-dang-bcas-pa #  ste / dri dang ro yang de-bzhin #  no

# dge slong reg-bya #  rnams ni phyi'i skye-mched #  yin te / 'byung-ba-chen-po-bzhi #  dag dang 'byung-ba-chen-po-bzhi #  dag rgyur-byas-pa #  gzugs-can #  bstan du med la thogs-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'o zhes gsungs te

cakzuH paSyati rUpANi
# mig gis gzugs rnams mthong

# gal-te #  mig gis mthong-ba # r gyur na / rnam-par-shes-pa #  gzhan dang ldan-pa # s kyang mthong-ba # r 'gyur ro zhe na
na vE sarvam cakzuH paSyati / kim tarhi / sa BAgam
# mig thams-cad-kyi # s mthong-ba #  ni ma-yin-pa #  nyid do / 'o na ci zhe na / brten bcas
sa vijQAnakam yadA Bavati tadA paSyati anyat yadA na iti
# gang-gi-tshe #  rnam-par-shes-pa #  dang bcas-pa #  de'i cho mthong gi gzhan-du #  ni ma yin no
evam tarhi tat eva cakzuH ASritam vijQAnam paSyati iti astu / na tad ASritam
# de lta na 'o na ni mig la brten-pa # 'i rnam-par-shes-pa #  de-kho-na # s mthong-ba # r 'gyur ro zhe na
vijQAnam / paSyati iti Sasyam avijQAtum / kim kAraNam
# de-la #  brten-pa # 'i rnam-par-shes-pa # s mthong ngo zhes nges-par-bya-ba # r nus-pa #  ni min no / ci'i-phyir #  zhe na
dRSyate rUpam na kila antaritam yatas
# gang phyir bar-du-chod-pa #  yi / gzugs ni mthong-ba #  min phyir lo
yasmAt kila rUpam kuXya Adi vyavahitam na dRSyate
# gang-gi-phyir #  rtsig pa la-sogs-pa # s bar-du-chod-pa # 'i gzugs mi mthong ngo zhes grag go
yadi hi vijQAnam paSyet tassya apratiGa tvAt kuXya Adizu pratiGAtaH na asti iti AvRtam api rUpam paSyet
# gal-te #  rnam-par-shes-pa # s mthong-ba # r gyur na de ni thogs-pa-med-pa # 'i phyir rtsig pa la-sogs-pa #  la yang-thog # s pa med-pa # s gzugs bsgribs-pa #  la yang mthong-ba # r 'gyur ro
na eva hAvRte cakzuH vijQAnam utpadyate iti anutpannam kaTam drakzyati / kim Kalu na utpadyate
# bsgribs-pa #  la ni mig gi rnam-par-shes-pa #  mi-skye-ba #  nyid de / de-bas-na #  ma-skyes-pa # s ji-ltar #  mthong-ba # r 'gyur / ci ste mi skye
yasya tu cakzuH paSyati tasya cakzuzaH sa pratiGa tvAt vyaya vahite vRtti aBAvaH iti vijQAnasya anutpatti rASrayeNa eka vizaya pravRtta tvAt yujyate yate / kim nu vE cakzuH prApta vizayam kAya indriya vat yatas AvRtam na paSyet
# gang-gi #  ltar na mig gis mthong-ba #  de'i ltar na ni mig thogs-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'i phyir bsgribs-pa #  la 'jug-pa-med-pa # s rnam-par-shes-pa #  yang rten dang lhan-cig-tu #  yul gcig la 'jug-pa # 'i phyir mi-skye-ba # r mi rung ngo / mig kyang lus kyi dbang-po #  bzhin-du #  yul de phrad-pa #  zhig yin nam ci na
sa pratiGa tvAt / kAca aBra pawala sPawika ambuBiH ca antaritam kaTam dRSyate
# 'di-ltar #  thogs-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'i phyir bsgribs-pa #  mi mthong mching bu dang lhang tsher dang shel dang chu dag gis bar-du-chod-pa #  yang ji-ltar #  mthong-ba # r 'gyur te
sa pratiGa tvAt cakzuzaH AvRtasya rUpasya adarSanam / kim tarhi
# de-lta-bas-na #  mig thogs-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'i phyir gzugs bsgribs-pa #  mi mthong-ba #  ni ma yin no / 'o na ji lta zhe na
yatra Alokasya apratibanDaH AvRte api rupe tatra upapadyate eva cakzuH vijQAnam / yatra tu pratibanDaH tatra na utpadyate iti anutpanna tvAt AvRtam na Ikzyate
# gang-la #  snang-ba #  la gegs med na gzugs bsgribs bzhin-du #  yang de-la #  mig gi rnam-par-shes-pa #  skye-ba #  nyid yin la / gang-la #  gegs yod-pa #  de ni mi-skye-ba # s ma-skyes-pa # 'i phyir bsgribs-pa #  mi mthong ngo
yat tarhi sUtre uktam cakzuzA rUpANi dRzwvA iti
# 'o na gang mdo las / gang mig gis gzugs rnams mthong-nas #  zhes gsungs so
tena ASrayeNa iti ayam atra aBisanDiH yaTA manasA DarmAn vijQAye tyAha / na ca manaH DarmAn vijAnAti / atIta tvAt / kim tarhi / manaH vijQAnam
# der ni dgongs-pa #  ni de-la #  brten-te #  zhes-bya-ba #  'di yin te / dper-na #  yid kyis chos-rnams #  rnam-par-shes-pa # r byas-na # s zhes gsungs-pa #  lta-bu # 'o / yid ni 'das-pa #  yin pa'i phyir / chos-rnams #  rnam-pa # r mi shes so / 'o na ci ltar zhe na
ASrita karma vE ASrayasya upacaryate
# yid kyi rnam-par-shes-pa # s so / yang-na #  brten-pa # 'i las brten la nye-bar #  btags-pa #  yin te
yaTA maQcAH kroSanti iti
# dper-na #  khri'u dag 'bod do zhes gsungs-pa #  lta-bu # 'o
yaTA ca sUtre uktam cakzuH vijQeyAni rUpANi izwAni kAntAn iti / na ca tAni cakzuzA vijQAyante
# ji-ltar #  mdo las / mig gi rnam-par-shes-pa # s shes-par-bya-ba # 'i gzugs-yid-du-'ong-ba #  sdug-pa #  rnams zhes gsungs-pa #  lta-bu #  ste / de-dag #  mig gis rnam-pa # r mi shes so
uktam ca sUtre cakzuH brAhmaNa dvAram yAvat eva rUpANAm darSanAya iti atas gamyate cakzuzA dvAreNa vijQAnam paSyati iti / darSane tatra dvAra AKyA / na hi etat yujyate / cakzuH dArSanam arUpANAm darSnAya iti
# mdo las / bram-ze #  mig ni 'di-lta-ste # / gzugs rnams mthong-ba # r bya-ba #  la sgo yin no zhes kyang gsungs te / de'i-phyir #  mig gi sgo nas mig gi rnam-par-shes-pa # s mthong ngo zhes-bya-ba # r khong du chud do / der ni lta-ba #  la sgo zhes-bya-ba # r zad do / mig ni gzugs rnams mthong-ba # r bya-ba #  la lta-ba #  yin no zhes-bya-ba #  'di ni mi rung ngo

# gang-gis #  gzugs rnam-par-shes-pa #  de nyid kyis 'di mi mthong mod
tat yaTA kAcid prajQA paSyati iti api ucyate prajAnAti iti api evam kiQcid vijQAnam paSyati iti api ucyAt vijAnAti iti api / anye punar AhuH
# dper-na #  shes-rab #  'ga' zhig la mthong zhes kyang bya / rab-tu-shes-pa #  zhes kyang bya-ba #  de-bzhin-du # / rnam-par-shes-pa #  'ga' zhig la mthong zhes kyang bya ste

# rnam-par-shes-pa #  zhes kyang bya'o / gzhan dag na re ni gal-te #  mig gis mthong na mig byed-pa-po # r gyur-pa # 'i lta-ba # 'i bya-ba #  gzhan gang zhig yin pa brjod dgos so zhes zer ro / de ni klan-ka # r mi rung ste

# ji-ltar #  rnam-par-shes-pa # s shas so zhes-bya-ba # r 'dod la

# de-la #  byed-pa-po #  dang bya-ba # 'i bye-brag #  kyang med-pa #  de-bzhin-du #  'di-la #  yang rung-ba # r 'gyur ro

# dper-na #  sgrogs ba'i rten-du-gyur-pa # 'i phyir dril sgrogs sa zhas bya-ba #  bzhin no zhes zer ro

# 'jig-rten #  na rnam-par-shes-pa #  de ni mthong-ba # 'o zhes grags te / 'di-ltar #  de skyes na gzugs mthong ngo zhes zer gyi rnam-pa # r shes so zhes ni mi zer ro

# bye-brag #  tu bshad-pa #  las kyang / mig dang phrad cing rnam-par-shes-pa # s nyams-su-myong-ba #  la mthong-ba #  zhes-bya-ba # 'o zhes 'byung ste / de-lta-bas-na #  mig gis mthong-ba #  kho-na #  zhes bya'i

yaTA sUryaH divasakaraH iti
# dper-na #  nyi-ma # s nyin par byed do zhes-bya-ba #  bzhin no
atra sOtrAntikAH AhuH / kim idam AkASam KAdyate

# rnam-par-shes-pa # s rnam-pa # r shes so zhes nye-bar-'dogs-pa # r byed-pa # s 'di-la #  mngon-par-zhen-pa # r mi bya'o
uktam hi BagavatA janapada niruktim na aBiniviSeta saMjQAm ca lokasya na aBiDAvedi iti / eza tu kASmIra vEBAzikANAm sidDAntaH
# bcom-ldan-'das #  kyis kyang ljongs-kyi-mi # 'i tshig la mngon-par-zhen-pa # r mi bya'o / 'jig-rten #  gyi ming la mngon-pa # r brgyug-pa # r mi bya'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro / mig gis mthong ngo / rna-ba # s thos so

# snas tshor ro / lces myong ngo / lus-kyis #  reg go / yid kyis rnam-pa # r shes so zhes-bya-ba #  'di ni kha che bye-brag #  tu smra-ba #  rnams kyi grub-pa # 'i mtha' yin no / ci mig gcig gis gzugs rnams mthong ngam / 'on te gnyi-ga # s she na

# 'di-la #  nges-pa #  med do

no ced spRzwasya api aprasaFgaH

dvAdaSAnAm ADyAtmikAnAm cakzuH AdayaH paQca sva nAma uktAH / sapta citta DAtavaH manu Endriyam stripuruza indriye kAya DAtu pradeH iti paScAt vakzyati / SezAH paQca DAtavaH DarmaDAtu pradeSaH ca na indriyam iti sidDam / aBiDarmakoSa BAzye DAtunirdeSaH nAma / praTamam koSa sTAnam samAptam iti / ye DarmAH hetu praBavAH hetum tezAm taTAgataH hi avadat / tezAm ca yaH nirhoDaH evaMvAdIu mahA SramaNaH / liKApitam idam SrI lAmAvAkena iti / dvitIyam koSa sTAnam / om namaH budDAya / uktAni indriyANi / kaH punar indriya arTaH / idam param ESvarye / tasya indanti iti indriyANi / atas ADipatya arTaH indriya arTaH / kasya ca ezAm kva ADipatyam / caturzu arTezu paQcAnAm ADipatyam / cakzuH SrotrayoH tAvat pratyekam caturzu arTA iva ADipatyam / Atma BAva SoBAyAm anDa baDirayoH akAnta rUpa tvAt / Atma BAva parikarzaNe dRzwvA SrutvA ca vizama parivarjanAt / cakzuH Srotra vijQAnayoH sa saMprayogayoH utpattO / rUpa darSana Sabda SAravaNayoH ca asADAraNa kAraNa tve / GrANa jihvA kAyAnAm Atma BAva SoBAyAm pUrvavat / Atma BAva parikarzaNe tEH kavaXIkAra AhAra pariBogAt / GrANa Adi vijQAnAnAm sa saMprayogANAm utpattO / ganDa GrANa rasa AsvAdana sprazwavya spaRSanAnAm ca asADAraNa kAraNa tve iti / dvayoH kila / caturNAm / strI puruza jIvitam anEndriyANAm / dvayoH arTayoH pratyekam ADipatyam / strI puruza indriyayoH tAvat sattva Beda vikalpayoH / tatra sattva BedaH strI puruzaH iti / sattva vikalpaH stana Adi saMsTAna svara AcArAn yaTAtvam / saMsleSa vyavadAnayoH iti apare / taTA hi tad viprayukta vikalpAnAm zaNXa paNXa koBaya vyaQjanAnAm asaMvarAn antArya kuASala mula samucCedAH na Bavanti saMvara Pala prApti vErAgyANi ca iti / jIvita indriyasya nikAya saBAga saMbanDa sADAraNayoH / manEndriyasya punarBavaa saMbanDa vaSi BAva anuvartanayoH / tatra punar Bavaa saMbanDe yaTA uktam ganDarvasya tasmin samaye dvayoH cittayoH anyatara anyatara cittam saMmuKIBUtam Bavati anunaya sahagatam vA pratiGa sasaha gatam vA iti / vaSi BAva anuvarttane yaTA uktam cittena ayam lokaH nIyate iti vistaraH / yat punar suKa Adi indriya paQcakam yAni ca azwO SradDA AdIni tezAm / paQcaka azwAnam saMkleSa vyavadAnayoH

rAga AdInAm tad anuSAyi tvAt / SradDA AdInAm vyavadAne / tEH rvya vat Ayate / vyavadAne api suKa AdInAm ADipatyam iti apare / yasmAt suKitasya cittam samADIyate

atas etAni zax pratyekam indriyam
# de'i-phyir #  de-dag #  ni so-so # r dbang-po #  yin no / 
nanu ca arTAnAm api atra ADipatyam / na ADipatyam / aDikam hi praBu tvam ADipatyam

cakzuzaH cakzuH rUpa upalabDO= aDikam ESvaryam / sarva rUpa upalabDO sAmAnya kAraNa tvAt tad pawu manda tA Adi anuviDAnAt ca upalabDeH / na rUpasya / tat hi paryayAt

evam yAvat manasaH Darmezu yojyam / srIti iva puMstva ADipatyAt tu kAyAt strI puruza indriye
# yid chos-rnams #  la dbang-byed-pa # 'i bar-du #  yang de-bzhin-du #  sbyar ro / mo nyid pho nyid las dbang phyir / lus-las #  mo dang-po # 'i dbang dag
kAya indriyAt eva strI puruza indriye pRTak vyavasTApyete / na arTantara BUte / kaScid asO kAya indriya BAgaH upasTa pradeSaH yaH strI puruza indriya AKyAm para tila Bate / yaTAkramam strI tva puMstvayyoH ADipatyAt / tatra strI BAvaH striyA AkRtiH svara cezwAH aBiprAyAH / etat hi striyA strI tvam / puMBAvaH puruza AkRtiH svara cezwAH aBiprAyAH / etat hi puMsaH puMstvam
# lus kyi dbang-po #  kho-na #  las mo dang pho'i-dbang-po #  dag rnam-pa # r bzhag-ste # / don tha-dad-pa # r gyur-pa #  dag ni med kyi lus kyi dbang-po # 'i cha 'ga' ste / mdoms kyi phyogs mo dang pho'i-dbang-po # 'i ming 'thob-pa #  gang-yin-pa #  de ni rim bzhin-du #  mo nyid dang pho nyid dag la dbang-byed-pa # 'i phyir ro / de-la #  mo'i ngo bo ni rang-bzhin #  nga-ro #  dang g-yo-ba #  dang bsam ba dag ste / de ni mo'i mo nyid yin no / pho'i ngo bo ni rang-bzhin #  nga-ro #  dang g-yo-ba #  dang bsam-pa-dag-pa #  dag ste / de ni pho'i pho nyid yin no / rigs gnas kun nas nyon mongs dang / rnam-pa # r byang la dbang byed phyir / srog dang tshor-ba #  rnams dang ni / dad sogs dbang-po-lnga # r 'dod do
nikAya sTiti saMkleSa vyavadAna ADipatyataH / jIvitam vedanAH paQca SradDA AdyAH ca indriyam matAH / nikAya saBAga sTitO jIvita indriyasya ADipatyam saMkleSe vedanAnAm / taTA hi suKAyAm vedanAyAm rAgaH anuSete duHKAyAm pratiGaH aduHKa asuKa AyAma vidyA iti uktam sUtre

# 'di-ltar #  de-dag #  gis nyon-mongs-pa #  rnams kyang rnam-pa # r gnon la-la # m yang 'dren-pa # r byed do
atas ete api pratyekam indriyam izwAH / AjQAsyA mI AKyam AjQA AKyam ajQAtO= indriyam taTA / uttara uttara saMprApti nirvANa Adi ADipatyataH
# de nyid kyi phyir de-dag #  kyang so-so # r dbang-po #  yin par 'dod do /  / mya-ngan #  'das sogs gong-na # s gong / 'thob-pa #  la ni dbang byed phyir / kun shes byed dang kun shes dang / de-bzhin #  kun shes ldan dbang-po #

# de-bzhin #  zhes-bya-ba # 'i sgra ni so-so # r dbang-po #  yin no zhes bstan-pa # 'i phyir ro
tatra AjQAsyAmi indriyasya ajQa indriyasya prAptO= ADipatyam / AjQa indriyasya ajQAtO= indriya prAptO AjQAtO= indriyasya parinirvANe
# de-la #  kun-shes-par-byed-pa # 'i dbang-po #  ni kun-shes-pa'i-dbang-po #  'thob-pa # r bya-ba #  la dbang byed do / kun-shes-pa'i-dbang-po #  ni / kun-shes-pa #  dang ldan-pa # 'i dbang-po #  thob-par-bya-ba #  la dbang byed do / kun-shes-pa #  dang ldan-pa # 'i dbang-po #  ni yongs su mya-ngan-las-'da'-ba # r bya-ba #  la dbang byed de

# kun-shes-pa #  dang ldan-pa # 'i dbang-po #  ni mthong-ba # 'i chos la bde-bar-gnas-pa # 'i phyir dbang byed de

# rnam-par-grol-ba # s dga'-ba-dang-bde-ba #  la so-so # r yang-dag-par-myong-ba # 'i phyir ro
ADipAtyAt indriya tve avidyA AdInAm upasaMKyAnam karttavyam
# dbang-byed-pa # 'i phyir dbang-po-nyid #  yin na / ma-rig-pa #  la-sogs-pa # s kha bskang dgos te
avidyA AdInAm api hi saMskAra Adizu ADipatyam atas ezAm api indriya tvam upasaMKyAtavyam / vAc AdInAm ca
# ma-rig-pa #  la-sogs-pa #  dag kyang 'du-byed #  la-sogs-pa #  rnams la dbang-byed-pa # s / de'i-phyir #  de-dag #  kyang dbang-po-nyid #  du kha bskang bar bya la
vAkyANi pAda pAyu upasTAnAm api ca indriya tvam upasaMKyAtavyam / vacana AdAna viharaNa utsarga Anandezu ADipatyAt / na Kalu upasaMKyAtavyam / yasmAt iha izwam
# ngag la-sogs-pa #  dag dang lag-pa #  dang rkang-pa #  dang rkub dang mdoms rnams kyang tshig dang len-pa #  dang 'gro-ba #  dang rtug pa dang kun-tu-dga'-ba # 'i bya-ba #  dag la dbang-byed-pa # 'i phyir dbang-po-nyid #  du kha bskang bar bya'o zhe na / kha bskang bar mi bya ste 'di-ltar #  'dir ni

# sems kyi rten dang de'i bye-brag #

# bdag-dang-gzhan #  la ltos-pa #  cig-car #  ro zhes ni mi zer ro / 'on-kyang #  mi 'dzem-pa #  kha-cig #  bdag la ltos nas kyang 'jug-pa #  yod-pa #  gang-yin-pa #  de ni ngo-tsha-med-pa #  yin no / gzhan la ltos nas 'jug-pa #  yod-pa #  gang-yin-pa #  de ni khrel-med-pa #  yin no / bzlog-pa #  ni ngo-tsha-shes-pa #  dang khrel-yod-pa #  yin par rig-par-bya #  ste / re-zhig #  rtog-pa #  dang-po #  ltar na gus-pa-dang-bcas-pa #  nyid de / bkur-ba #  dang bcas-pa #  nyid dang 'jigs-pa # s dbang-sgyur-ba #  dang bcas-pa #  nyid ni ngo-tsha-shes-pa #  yin la / kha-na-ma-tho-ba #  dag la 'jigs-par-lta-ba #  nyid ni khrel-yod-pa #  yin no

# rtog-pa #  gnyis-pa #  ltar na ni bdag-dang-gzhan #  la ltos ba dag las 'dzem-pa #  dag yin no / dga'-ba-dang-gus-pa #  la tha-dad-du-bya-ba #  ci-zhig #  yod ce na / dga' dang zhes-bya-ba #  smos te / dga'-ba #  ni rnam-pa-gnyis #  te / nyon-mongs-pa-can #  dang nyon-mongs-pa-can #  ma-yin-pa # 'o / de-la #  nyon-mongs-pa-can #  ni srid-pa #  ste

# gang-zag #  dag la ltos nas ni dga'-ba #  yin la gus-pa #  ma-yin-pa #  ni bu-dang-chung-ma #  dang lhan-cig-gnas-pa #  dang nye gnas dag la dga'-ba #  lta-bu # 'o / gus-pa #  yin la dga'-ba #  ma-yin-pa #  ni bla-ma #  gzhan dag la gus-pa #  lta-bu # 'o / gnyi-ga #  yin pa ni rang-gi #  bla-ma #  dag la gus-pa #  lta-bu # 'o

# de-gnyi-ga #  ma-yin-pa #  ni rnam-pa #  de-dag #  ma-gtogs-pa # 'o
SradDA hi nAma guNa saMBAvanA / tad pUrvikA ca priya tA prema / tasmAt na sA eva premA iti apare / guru tvam hrIH / gOravam hi nAma sasa pratISa tA / tad pUrvikA ca lajjA hrIH / atas na gOravavam eva hlIH iti apare / te punar kAma rUpayoH
# gzhan dag na re dad-pa #  zhes-bya-ba #  ni yon-tan #  la yid-ches-pa #  yin la / de sngon-du-'gro-ba # 'i dga'-ba #  ni dga' pa yin te / de-lta-bas-na #  de nyid-dga'-ba #  yin no zhes zer ro / gus nyid ngo tsha shes / gus-pa #  ni ngo-tsha-shes-pa #  ji-skad #  bshad-pa #  yin no / gzhan dag na re gus-pa #  zhes-bya-ba #  ni bkur-ba #  dang bcas-pa #  nyid yin la / de sngon-du-'gro-ba # 'i 'dzem-pa #  ni ngo-tsha-shes-pa #  yin te / de'i-phyir #  gus-pa #  nyid ngo-tsha-shes-pa #  ma yin no zhes zer ro / de gnyis 'dod dang gzugs dag na
ArUpya DAtO prema gOrave na staH
# gzugs-med-pa'i-khams #  na ni dga'-ba-dang-gus-pa #  dag med do
nanu ca SradDA hrIH ca kuSala mahABUmika tvAt tatra api vidyete
# dad-pa #  dang ngo-tsha-shes-pa #  dge pa'i sa mang-po #  pa yin pa'i phyir de na yang yod-pa #  ma yin nam zhe na

# dad-pa #  ni rnam-pa-gnyis #  te / chos dag dang gang-zag #  la dad-pa #  yin la / bkur-ba #  dang bcas-pa #  nyid kyang de dang 'dra'o
tatra ye pudgala Alambane SradDA hriyO te tatra na staH / te ca iha prema gOrave aBiprete
# de-la #  gang dag gang-zag #  la dmigs-pa # 'i dad-pa #  dang ngo-tsha-shes-pa #  de-dag #  de na med de / 'dir ni dga'-ba-dang-gus-pa #  de-dag #  la bsams-pa #  yin no
vitarka vicArayoH kim nAnA kAraNam / vitarka cArAH vOdArya sUkzmate / kasya / cetasaH iti paScAt vakzyati / citta OdArika tA vitarkaH
# rtogs-pa #  dang dpyod-pa #  dag la tha-dad-du-bya-ba #  ci-zhig #  yod ce na / rtog dang dpyod-pa #  rtsing zhib nyid / gang-gi #  zhe na / sems kyi'o zhes 'og nas 'chad de
citta sUkzmatA vicAraH / kaTam punar anayoH ekatra citte yogaH / kecid AhuH / yaTA api asunizWyUtam sarpiH sUrya raSmiBiH Upa rizwAt spRzwam na atiSyAyate na ativilIyate evaMvitarka vicAra yogAt cittam na ati sUkzmam Bavati na ati udArika iti uBayoH api tatra asti vyApAraH / evam tarhi nimiwta BUtO vitarka vicAra OdArika sUkzmatayoH prApnutaH yaTA payaH ca tapaH ca sarpizaH SyAna tva vilIna tvayoH na tu punar tad svaBAvO
# rtog-pa #  ni sems rtsing ba'o / dpyod-pa #  ni sems zhib pa'o / sems-gcig #  la de gnyis ji-ltar #  ldan zhe na / kha-cig #  na re dper-na #  mar sar chu dag gi nang-du #  bor-ba #  steng nas nyi-ma'i-'od #  zer dag gis reg na ha-cang #  yang mi 'khyag la / ha-cang #  yang mi 'ju ba de-bzhin-du # / sems kyang rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dang ldan-pa # 'i phyir ha-cang #  zhib par yang mi 'gyur / ha-cang #  rtsing bar yang mi 'gyur la / de-la #  gnyi-ga # 'i bya-ba #  yang yod do zhes zer ro / de lta na ni ji-ltar #  nyi-ma #  dang chu mar sar 'khyag pa nyid dang 'ju ba nyid dag gi rgyu mtshan-nyid #  yin gyi de-dag #  gi ngo-bo-nyid #  ni ma-yin-pa #  ltar rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dag kyang rtsing ba dang zhib pa nyid dag gi rgyu mtshan-du #  gyur-pa #  yin no / rtsing ba dang zhib pas dang rnam-pa # 'i bye-brag #  gis ltos-pa #  can yang yin-pas #  srid-pa # 'i rtse mo'i bar-du #  rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dag yod-pa # r 'gyur ro
ApekzikI ca OdArika sUkzmatA BUmi prakAra Beda Aditya aBava agrAt vitarka vicArO syAtAm / nacOdArika sUkzmAtayA jAti BedaH yukataH
# rtsing ba dang zhib pa nyid kyis rang-bzhin #  tha-dad-pa # r yang rigs-pa #  ma yin no / gzhan dag na re mdo las rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dag ni ngag mngon-par-'du-byed-pa #  yin par gsungs te
anye punar AhuH / vAc saMskArAH vitrka vicArAH sUtre uktAH / vitarkya vicArya vAcam BAzate nAvitasya avicArya iti
# brtags-shing #  dpyad nas tshig tu smra'i ma brtags ma dpyad-pa # r ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo / de-la #  rtsing ba gang dag yin pa de-dag #  ni rtog-pa #  yin no

# zhib pa gang dag yin pa de-dag #  na dpyod-pa #  yin no zher zer ro

# gal-te #  sems rtse gcig la rtsing ba yang chos gzhan yin / zhib pa yang chos gzhan yin na 'di-la #  'gal-ba #  ci-zhig #  yod
na syAt viroDaH yadi jAti BedaH syAt vedanA saMjQA vat
# gal-te #  tshor-ba #  dang 'du-shes #  bzhin-du #  rigs tha-dad-pa #  zhig yin na ni 'gal-ba #  med do
ekasyAm jAtO mRdu aDimAtra tA yugapad na saMBavavati / jAti BedaH / sa tarhi vaktavyaH
# rigs gcig pa ni chung du dang chen-pa #  nyid cig-car-'byung-ba #  mi srid do / rigs tha-dad-pa #  yang yod do / 'o na ni de brjod-pa # r bya dgos so

pratyekam jAtInAm mRdu aDimAtratavAt / na eva hi vitarka vicArO= ekatra citte BavataH iti apare
# rigs re-re #  la yang chung du dang chen-po #  yod-pa # 'i phyir ro / gzhan dag na re sems-gcig #  la rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dag mi-'byung-ba #  nyid do zhes zer ro

# pha rol po las gang yang rung pa'i khyad-par #  zhig yongs-su-brtags-nas #  sems khengs-pa #  ni nga-rgyal #  lo

uktAH saha cittena ca etAH prakAraSa stezAm punar imAH saMjQAH pariBAzyante / pravacanaH etABiH sat vyavahArAt

# kha-cig #  na re dge-ba #  dang mi-dge-ba # 'i khams dag gis bsags-pa # s na sems so / de nyid rten-du-gyur-pa #  ni yid do / rten-pa # r gyur-pa #  ni rnam-par-shes-pa # 'o zhes zer ro
yaTA cittam manaH vijQAnam iti ekaH arTaH / evam / citta cEtasAH / sa ASrayAH lambana AkArAH saMpara yuktAH ca / ekaH arTaH
# ji-ltar #  sems dang yid dang rnam-par-shes-pa #  zhes-bya-ba #  don gcig pa de-bzhin-du #  sems dang sems byung dang /  / rten dang dmigs dang rnam bcas dang mtshungs-pa # r ldan ba'ang / don gcig ste

tatra tAvat / praptirlABaH samanvayaH

# thob-pa #  ni rnam-pa-gnyis #  te / ma-thob-pa #  dang rnam-pa # r nyams-pa #  las rnyed-pa #  dang thob-nas #  ldan-pa # 'o
viparyayAt aprAptiH iti sidDam / kasya punar ime prApti aprAptI / prApti aprAptI sva saMtAna patitAnAm / na para saMtAnsaMtAna patitAnAm
# bzlog-pa #  ni ma-thob-pa #  zhes-bya-ba # r grub bo / thob-pa #  dang ma-thob-pa #  'di dag gang-gi #  yin zhe na / thob dang ma thob dang rgyud du / gtogs-pa #  rnams kyi'o / gzhan-gyi-rgyud #  du gtogs-pa #  rnams kyi ni ma yin te

# 'di ni re-zhig #  'dus-ma-byas #  dag gi nges-pa #  yin no / 'dus-ma-byas #  rnams kyi thob-pa #  dang ma-thob-pa #  dag ni / 'gog gnyis kyi / so-sor-brtags-pa #  ma-yin-pa # s 'gog-pa #  dang ni sems-can-thams-cad #  dang ldan no

# so-sor-brtags-pa # s 'gog-pa #  dang ni 'ching-ba #  mtha'-dag #  dang ldan-pa #  skad-cig-ma #  dang-po #  la gnas-pa #  ma-gtogs-pa #  'phags-pa #  thams-cad #  dang so-so'i-skye-bo #  kha-cig #  kyang yin no / nam-mkha' #  dang ni 'ga' yang ldan ba med de

# gang-la #  thob-pa #  med-pa #  de-la #  ni ma-thob-pa #  yang med do zhes-bya-ba #  ni grub-pa # 'i mtha' yin no

# thob-pa #  zhes-bya-ba #  rdzas gzhan cung-zad-cig #  yod do zhes-bya-ba #  'di gang-la # s / smras-pa #  mdo las te

# mdo las de mi-slob-pa # 'i chos bcu po 'di dag bskyed cing so-so # r thob-pa #  las kun-tu #  ldan-pa # s na yan-lag-lnga #  rnam-par-spangs-pa # 'i 'phags-pa # r gyur ro zhes rgyas-pa # r gsungs so

# mdo las dge slong dag 'khor-lo # s sgyur-pa # 'i rgyal-po #  rin-po-che-sna-bdun #  dang ldan-pa #  zhes rgyas-pa # r 'byung-ba # 'i phyir ro

# de-lta-na-yang #  mi-rung-ba #  ci-zhig #  yod / mi-rung-ba #  'di dag yod de / gang-gi-phyir #  gzugs dang sgra la-sogs-pa #  ltar ram / 'dod-chags #  dang zhe-sdang #  la-sogs-pa #  ltar 'di'i rang-gi #  ngo bo yang mi snang la / mig dang rna-ba #  la-sogs-pa #  ltar bya-ba #  yang mi-snang-ba #  de'i-phyir #  rdzas kyi chos mi srid-pa # s mi rung ngo

asaMskRtasya na syAt

# de-dag #  chu las ji tsam gyen-du #  'phags-pa #  rngams su yang de tsam ste / rgyar zhes-bya-ba # 'i tha-tshig #  go / de-dag #  bar bdun rol mtsho yin
ezAm ca niminDara antanAm parvatAnAm sapta antarANi sapta SItAH ucyante pUrNAH azwa aFga upetasya pAnIyasya / tat hi pAnIyam SItalam ca svAdu ca laGu ca mRdu ca acCam ca nizpratikam ca pibataH ca kaNWam na kziNoti pItam ca kukzim na vyAbADate / tAsAm ca punar / Adya aSIti sahasrikA
# mu-khyud-'dzin #  la thug-pa # 'i ri de-dag #  gi bar bdun ni rol mtsho bdun zhes bya ste / yan-lag-brgyad #  dang ldan-pa # 'i chus gang ngo / chu de ni bsil ba dang zhim-pa #  dang yang pa dang 'jam-pa #  dang dangs pa dang dri-nga-ba-med-pa #  dang 'thung na mgrin-pa #  la mi-gnod-pa #  dang 'thungs na lto la mi-gnod-pa # 'o / yang de-dag #  las / dang-po #  stong phrag brgyad cu'o

avitarkam karma DyAna antarAt praBRti yAvat Bava agre / tasya avitarkasya kuSalasya karmaNaH ca etasikya iva vedanA vipAkaH
# rnam-par-rtog-pa #  med-pa # 'i las ni bsam-gtan #  khyad-par-can #  nas srid-pa # 'i rtse mo'i bar dag na yod de / dge-ba'i-las #  rnam-par-rtog-pa #  med-pa #  de'i rnam-par-smin-pa #  ni sems-kyi-tshor #  ba kho-na #  yin no
kasmAt na kAyikI
# ci'i-phyir #  lus kyi ma yin zhe na
tasyAH avaSyam sa vitarkvitarka vicAra tvAt / kAyikya iva aSuBasya tu / akuSalasya karmaNaH kAyikyA iva vedanA vipAkaH
# de ni gdon-mi-za-bar #  rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dang dpyad-pa #  yin pa'i phyir ro / mi-dge-ba #  ni lus kyi yin / mi-dge-ba'i-las #  kyi rnam-par-smin-pa #  ni lus-kyi-tshor #  ba kho-na #  yin no
kasmAt na cEtasikI / tasya hi duHKA vedanA vipAkaH cEtasikI ca duHKA vedanA dOrmanasyam na ca dOrmanasyam vipAkaH iti vyAKyAtam etat / yat tarhi sattvAnAm citta kzepaH Bavati
# ci'i-phyir #  sems kyi ma yin zhe na / de'i rnam-par-smin-pa #  ni sdug-bsngal-gyi-tshor-ba #  yin la / sems kyi sdug-bsngal-gyi-tshor-ba #  ni yid-mi-bde-ba #  yin te / yid-mi-bde-ba #  ni rnam-par-smin-pa #  ma yin no zhes de ni bshad-zin #  to
katamasmin= asO citte Bavati kena vA kAraNena / citta kzepaH manaH citte
# 'o na sems-can-rnams-kyi-sems #  g-yeng bar 'gyur-ba #  gang-yin-pa #  de ni sems gang zhig la gnas-pa #  yin / rgyu ni ci-zhig #  gis 'gyur zhe na / g-yeng ba'i sems ni yid sems las
manaH vijQAnaH iti arTaH / nahi paQcasu vijQAnakAyezu cittam kzipyate / avikalpaka tvAt / sa ca karma vipAka jaH
# yid kyi rnam-par-shes-pa #  zhes-bya-ba # 'i tha-tshig #  go / rnam-par-shes-pa # 'i tshogs lnga la gnas-pa #  la ni g-yeng ba med de / rnam-par-mi-rtog-pa # 'i phyir ro / de ni las kyi rnam smin skyes / g-yeng ba'i sems de ni sems-can #  rnams kyi las kyi rnam-par-smin-pa #  las skyes-pa #  yin te
sa ca eza citta kzepaH sattvAnAm karma jaH / ye hi dravya mantra prayogeNa vA parezAm cittam kzepayanti akAmakam vA vizam madyam vA pAyayanti trAsayanti vA mRgayA Adizu agnim vA dAvezu utsRjanti prapAtAt vA pAtayanti anyena vA kenacid prezAm smRtim BraMSayanti tezAm tasya karmaNaH vipAkena AyatyAm cittam kzipyate
# rdzas dang gsang-sngags #  kyi sbyor-ba # s pha rol gyi sems g-yeng bar byed-pa # 'am / mi-'dod-bzhin-du #  dug dang myos-pa # r 'gyur-ba #  ldud-pa # 'am / ri dags la-sogs-pa #  skrag-par-byed-pa # 'am / nags mes gtong-ba #  'am / g-yang du 'dor-bar-byed-pa #  'am / gzhan gang-yang-rung-ba # s pha rol po dag gi sems nyams-par-byed-pa #  de-dag #  las de'i rnam-par-smin-pa # s che phyi-ma-la #  sems g-yeng bar 'gyur ro

# skrag gnod ma mnyam mya-ngan #  gyis
kaTam tAvat Bayena
# re-zhig #  skrag-pa # s ji-lta-bu #  zhe na
amanuzya AdayaH manuzyAn virUpeNa rUpeNa upasaMkrAmanti / teByaH BItAnAm cittam kzIpyate / kaTam upaGAtena
# mi-ma-yin-pa #  gzugs-mi-sdug-pa # s mi'i gan du nye-bar #  'ongs la de-dag #  gis skrag-pa #  rnams sems g-yeng bar 'gyur ro / gnod-pa # s ji-lta-bu #  zhe na
amanuzyAH eva kupitAH manuzyANAm marmasu praharanti / kaTam mahABUta vEzamyeNa / vAta pitta SlezmANaH prakopam Apadyante / kaTam Sokena / yaTA vAsizWI praBRtInAm
# mi-ma-yin-pa #  de-dag-nyid #  du 'khrugs nas gnad du snun-par-byed-pa # s so / 'byung-ba-chen-po #  ma mnyam-pa # s ji-lta-bu #  zhe na / rlung dang mkhris-pa #  dang-ba # d kan dag 'khrugs-par-gyur-pa # 'o / mya-ngan #  gyis ji-lta-bu #  zhe na / dper-na #  gnas byed kyi bu la-sogs-pa #  lta-bu # 'o

sat avadyam RzAvAdaH tena BettA samanvitaH / saMGa Beda avadyena BettA samanvAgataH / tat punar mRzAvAdaH / sa punar saMGa Beda sahaje vAc vijQapti avijQaptI / sa ca tena avadyena samanvAgataH BettA / avIcO pacyate kalpan / antara kalpam avIcO mahAnarake vipacyate / anyEH tu na avaSyam avIcO / aTa yena bahu nyAn antaryANi kRtAni Bavanti anantaram eva tAni vipacyante / kim tu tEH tasya Bavati / aDhikEH aDikA rujaH / sahi BUyoBiH AnantaryEH tasmin= avIcO Ganataram sukumArataram ca ASrayam laBate kAraNAH ca bahutarAH tIvratarAH ca yena dvi tri catuzpaQca guNAm vedanAm vedayate / kaH punar eza saMGam Banatti / BikzuH du kva caritaH vRttI Binatti / BikzuH Binatti na gRhI na BikzuNyA AdayaH / sa ca dRzwi caritaH eva na tRzNA caritaH / RtasTaH na Binna vRttaH tasya anAdeya vAkya tvAt / kva Binatti / atra BagavAn saMnihitaH tatas / anyatra / na hi SAstuH eva saMniDO SakyaH Bettum / taTAgatAnAm duzprasaha tvAt Adeya vAkya tvAt ca / kAn Binatti / bAliSAn / pRTagjanAn eva nAryAn pratyakza Darma tvAt / tAn api na kzAnti lABinaH iti apare / kiyatA BinnaH saMGaH Bavati / SAstR mArga antara kzAntO BinnaH / yadA teByaH taTAgatAt anyaH SAstA kzamate tad upadizwAt ca mArgAt anyaH mArgaH iyatA BinnaH saMGaH vaktavyaH / kiyantam kAlam BinnaH Aste / tAm eva rAtrim / na vivasati asO / aparyuzitaH eva hi saMGa Bede saMGaH avaSyam pratisaMDIyate / yaH ayam saMGa BedaH uktaH / cakraBedaH sa ca mataH / Darma cakram hi tadA BagavataH Binnam Bavati / mArga pravRtti vizWApanAt / atas eva cakrAdaH ca ucyate saMGa BedaH ca / kva punar cakra BedaH Bavati / jambUdvIpe / na anyezu dvIpezu / katiBiH BikzuBiH / nava AdiBiH / nava Adim kRtvA / pareNa aniyamaH / azwO BikzayaH saMGaH Bavati / navamaH BettA / avaSyam hi saMGena dvayoH pakzayoH sTAtavyam / evam BinnaH Bavati / anyaH tu saMGa BedaH karma BedAt Bavati / yadi eka sImAyAm vyagrAH karma kurvanti / sa ca eza / karma BedaH trizu dvIpezu / yezu eva SAsanam / katiBiH BikzuBiH / azwABiH aDikEH ca saH / cakraBedaH tu zawsu kAlezu na Bavati / katamezu / AdO= ante arbudAt pUrvam yugAt ca uparate munO / sImAyAm ca api abadDAyAm cakra BedaH na jAyate / AdO= acira pravartite Darma cakre / ante parinirvANa kAle BagavataH / etayoH hi dvayoH avasTayoH saMGaH eka rasaH Bavati / maDye api arbudAt pUrvam na Bidyate yAvat SAsane SIla arbudam dRzwi arbudam ca na utpannam Bavati / yugAt ca pUrvam na Bidyate yAvat SrAvaka agra yugam na utpannam Bavati / Binna nyAya parivAsAt tena ca pratisaMDAnIya tvAt / uparate munO SAstari parinirvRte pratidvandva aBAvAt

na Bakti mAtreNa / yadi sva kzetre dAna kriyA vIjam izwa Palam Bavati tad kzetre tarhi anizwa Palam Bavizyati / kukzetre api izwa Pala tA Pala bIja aviparyayAt / kukzetre api Palasya bIjAt aviparyayaH dRzwaH mRdvIkA bIjAt mRdvIkA Palam eva utpadyate maDuram nimbavIjAn nimbam eva tiktam

# de spong-ba #  ni tshul-khrims #  yin no
sA punar viratiH / dviDA / yayA ca viramyate vijQaptyA yat ca tat viramaNam avijQaptiH / na ca kevalam dOHSIlyAt viratiH SIlam / kim tarhi / pratikziptAt ca budDena
# spong-ba #  de-yang #  rnam-pa-gnyis #  so / rnam-par-rig-byed #  gang-gis #  spong-bar-byed-pa #  dang rnam-par-rig-byed #  ma-yin-pa #  spong-ba #  gang-yin-pa # 'o / tshul-khrims #  ni 'chal-ba'i-tshul-khrims #  las spong-ba #  'ba'-zhig #  kyang ma yin no / 'o na ji-lta-bu #  zhe na / sangs-rgyas #  kyis ni bcad-pa #  yang
yat api na prakRtyA dOHSIlayam BagavatA ca budDena pratikziptam akAla Bojana Adikam tasmAt api dviDA viratiH SIlam
# rang-bzhin-gyis #  'chal-ba'i-tshul-khrims #  ma yin yang sangs-rgyas #  bcom-ldan-'das #  kyis bcad-pa #  dus-ma-yin-pa # 'i zas la-sogs-pa #  gang dag yin pa de-dag #  spong-ba #  rnam-pa-gnyis #  kyang tshul-khrims #  yin te
samAttaSikzasya tu tat aDyAcArAt dOHSIlyam jAyate / uktam tamAsena SIlam / viSudDam tu caturguNam / tat tu SIlam caturguNam Bavati / viparyayAda viSudDam / aTa kaTam caturguNam iti Aha
# slab pa mnos-pa # s de-dag #  spyad na 'chal-ba'i-tshul-khrims #  su 'gyur ro / tshul-khrims #  mdor bshad-zin #  to / rnam dag yon-tan #  bzhi ldan no / yon-tan #  bzhi dang ldan-pa # 'i tshul-khrims #  de ni rnam-par-dag-pa #  yin no / bzlog-pa #  ni rnam-par-ma-dag-pa #  yin no / ji-ltar #  na yon-tan #  bzhi dang ldan-pa #  yin zhe na

#  / 'chal-ba'i-tshul-khrims #  kyi rgyus 'phen ma-byung-ba #  ni chags-pa #  la-sogs-pa #  nyon-mongs-pa #  dang nye-ba'i-nyon-mongs-pa #  rnams kyis 'phen ma-byung-ba # 'i phyir ro

# las-kyi-lam #  dngos kyis rnam-par-dag-pa #  yin pa dang nyer-bsdogs #  dag gis rnam-par-dag-pa #  dang rnam-par-rtog-pa #  rnams kyis 'phen ma-byung-ba #  dang / dran-pa # s yongs-su-bzung-ba #  dang mya-ngan-las-'das-pa # r yongs-su-bsngos-pa #  yin no zhes zer ro
caturviDam SIlam iti apare

# 'jigs-pa # 'i tshul-khrims #  ni 'tsho-ba-med-pa #  dang tshigs-su-bcad-pa #  med-pa #  dang chad-pa #  dang ngan-'gro # s 'jigs nas srung-ba #  gang-yin-pa # 'o

samAhitam tu kuSalam BAvanA

kim idam samAhitam nAma / samADi svaBAvam sahaBU yat
# mnyam-par-gzhag-pa #  zhes-bya-ba #  'di ci-zhig #  ce na / ting-nge-'dzin #  gyi rang-bzhin #  dang de dang lhan-cig-'byung-ba #  gang-yin-pa # 'o

tat hi samAhitam kuSalam atyarTam cittam vAsayati / guNEH tad mayIkaraNAt saMtateH
# mnyam-pa # r ma bzhag-pa # 'i dge-ba #  de ni rgyud yon-tan #  rnams kyis de'i-bdag-nyid #  du byed-pa # 'i phyir sems la shin-tu #  sgo-bar-byed-pa #  yin te
puzpEH tila BAvanA vat
# me-tog #  rnams kyis til la bsgos-pa #  bzhin no
dAnam tAvat mahA BogatAyE saMvartate iti uktam / aTa SIlam BAvanA ca
# re-zhig #  sbyin-pa # s ni longs-spyod-chen-po # r 'gyur ro zhes bshad na / yang-na #  tshul-khrims #  dang bsgom-pa # s cir 'gyur zhe na
svargAya SIlam prADAnyAt visaMyogAya BAvanA / dAnam api svargAya SIlam prADAnyAt
# mtho-ris #  don-du #  tshul-khrims #  dang / 'bral-ba # 'i don-du #  bsgom gtso'i phyir / sbyin-pa #  yang mtho-ris-kyi-don #  du ni 'gyur mod kyi tshul-khrims #  ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro
SIlam api visaMyogAya / BAvanA tu prADAnyAt
# tshul-khrims #  kyis kyang 'bral-ba # r mi 'gyur mod kyi bsgom-pa #  ni gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro
sutraH uktam catvAraH pudgalAH brAhmaNyam puNyam prasavanti iti / katamat tat brAhmapuNyam
# mdo las gang-zag #  bzhi ni tshangs-pa # 'i bsod nams skyed do zhes gsungs-pa # / tshangs-pa # 'i bsod nams gang zhig yin zhe na / bye-brag #  tu smra-ba #  rnams na re
yat tad lakzaNa vipAkasya karmaNaH parimANa jQApanAya uktam iti vEBAzikAH / pUrva AcAryAH tu vyAcakzate / caturNAm brAhma puNya tvam kalpam svargezu modanAt / yAvatA puNyena kalpam svargezu modate idam brAhmam puNyam
# mtshan-ma #  rnam-par-smin-pa #  can gyi las kyi tshad shes-par-bya-ba # 'i phyir bshad-pa #  gang-yin-pa # 'o zhes zer ro / sngon gyi slob-dpon #  rnams na re / bskal-pa # r mtho-ris #  dag gnas phyir / bzhi yi tshangs-pa # 'i bsod nams yin / zhes zer te / bsod nams ji tsam gyis na bskal-pa # r mtho-ris #  su dga'-ba # r gnas-par-'gyur-ba #  'di ni tshangs-pa # 'i bsod nams yin te
brahma purohitAnAm kalpa Ayuzka tvAt / nikAya antare gATAm paWanti
# tshangs-pa'i-mdun-na-'don #  pa rnams kyi tshe bskal-pa # r thub-pa # 'i phyir ro
brAhmam puNyam prasavati kalpam svargezu modataH iti / Amiza dAnam uktam / Darma dAnam vaktavyam / tat idam ucyate
# sde-pa #  gzhan-las #  kyang / tshangs-pa # 'i bsod nams bskyed-pa #  ni / bskal-pa # r mtho-ris #  dga'-ba # r gnas / zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung ngo / zang-zing-gi-sbyin-pa #  bshad-zin #  to / chos-kyi-sbyin-pa #  brjod-pa # r bya ste / des smras-pa #
Darma dAnam yaTA BUta sUtra Adya klizwa deSanA

yaTA antarA parinirvAyiNaH evam yavat UrDvasrotasaH iti aBisamasya sarve catvAriMSat UnAni trayodaSa sahasra Apya nAgAminAm Bavanti / ABava agra azwa BAga kzitaha tattve pratipakzakaH / anAgAmi iti aDikRtam / sa Kalu ayam anAgAmI praTama DyAna eka prakAra vErAgyAt prabRti yAvat Bava agra azwa prakAra prahANAt arhat tva pratipannakaH Bavanti / navamasya api Anantya paTe / navamasya api BAva agrikasya prakArasya prahANAya anantarya mArge saH arhat tva pratipannakaH eva / vajra upamaH ca saH / sa ca anantarya mArgaH vajra upamaH samADiH iti ucyeta / sarva anuSaya Bedi tvAt / Binna tvAt asO na punar sarvAn Binatti / sarvAH tu Bettum samarTaH / sarvAn antar yama argANAm aDimAtratama tvAt / vajra upamAnAm tu bahu Bedam varNayanti / anAgAmya saMgRhItAH BAva agrika duHKa samudAya AlambanEH duHKa samudaya anvaya jQAna AkArEH saMprayuktAH azwO / niroDa mArga DarmDarma jQAna AkArEH saMprayuktAH azwO / niroDa anvaya jQAna AkArEH saMprayuktAH praTama DyAna niroDa AlambanAH catvAraH / evam yAvat Bava agra niroDa AlambanAH catvAraH / mArga anvaya jQAna AkArEH saMprayuktAH catvAraH

Pala dvayasya tAvat avIta rAga prApya tvAt UrDvam aprAptiH yuktA / tRtIyasya tu kasmAt aprAptiH / na UrDvam hi dRS paTaH
# re-zhig #  'bras-bu #  gnyis ni 'dod-chags #  dang ma-bral-ba # s thob bar bya-ba #  yin pa'i phyir gong-ma # r mi-'thob-pa # r yang rigs na gsum-pa #  go / ci'i-phyir #  mi 'thob ce na / gong-na #  mthong lam med

na ca tena vinA asti vIta rAgasya anAgAmi Pala prAptiH iti etat kAraNam / kim punar kAraNam tatra darSandarSana mArgaH na asti
# de med-pa # r yang 'dod-chags-dang-bral-ba # 'i phyir-mi-'ong-ba # 'i 'bras-bu #  thob-pa #  med-pa # s zhes-bya-ba #  'di ni gtan-tshigs #  yin no / ci'i-phyir #  de na mthong-ba'i-lam #  med ce na

AgamaH api ayam paQcAnAm pudgalAnAm iha viDA tatra nizWA antarA parinirvAyiNaH yAvat UrDvaMsrotasaH iti / viDAH hi mArga ramBaH nirvANa upAya tvAt / idam uktam yat yakopyaH kzaya jQAnAt anutpAdam ati riti

# de-dag #  las / lnga ni dad-pa # s mos las skyes
akokpya DarmANam varjayitvA anye paQca SradDA aDimukti pUrvakAH / vimuktiH sAmayikyezAm

ezAm ca paQcAnAm sAmayikI kAnta cetaH vimuktiH veditavyA / nitya anurakzya tvAt
# de-dag #  rnam grol dus dang sbyor / lnga po 'di dag gi sems kyi rnam-par-grol-ba #  ni dus dang sbyor-ba # s 'phangs-pa #  yin par rig-par-bya #  ste / rtag-tu #  rjes su srung-ba # 'i phyir ro
atas eva ete samaya vimuktAH ucyante

# 'di dag ni dus la ltos-pa #  yang yin la rnam-par-grol-ba #  yang yin-pas #  dus kyi rnam-par-grol-ba #  dag ste / bar gyi tshig mi mngon-pa # r byas-pa # 'i phyir mar gyi bum-pa #  bzhin no
ezAm hi samaya apekzA samADi saMmuKIBAvaH upakaraNa Arogya deSa viSeza apekza tvAt / akopya akopya DarmaNaH
# 'di dag gi ting-nge-'dzin #  mngon-sum-du-gyur-pa #  ni yo-byad #  dang nad-med-pa #  dang yul gyi bye-brag #  la ltos-pa # 'i phyir dus la ltos-pa #  yin no / mi g-yo'i chos-can #  mi g-yo-ba #

# mi g-yo-ba # 'i chos-can #  gyi rnam-par-grol-ba #  ni yongs-su-mi-nyams-pa # 'i sgo nas g-yo-ba # r mi-nus-pa # 'i phyir mi g-yo-ba #  yin no / de'i-phyir #  de dus mi sbyor grol / de nyid kyi phyir de ni dus dang mi sbyor-ba # r rnam-par-grol-ba #  zhes-bya-ba #  ste
sa hi asamaya apekzA vimuktiH ca / icCAtaH samADi saMmuKIBAvAt
# de ni 'dod dgur ting-nge-'dzin #  mngon-sum-du #  gyur ba'i phyir dus la mi ltos-pa # r rnam-par-grol-ba #  yin no
kAla antara atyanta vimuktitaH vA kopya Akopya DarmaNoH samaya asamaye vimukta tvam parihANi saMBava asaMBavataH / dRzwi praptAn vayaH ca saH
# yang-na #  yongs-su-nyams-pa #  srid-pa #  dang mi srid-pa # 'i sgo nas dus gzhan gyi bar dang gtan-du #  rnam-par-grol-ba # 'i phyir dus kyi rnam-par-grol-ba #  dang dus dang mi sbyor-ba # r rnam-par-grol-ba #  nyid yin no

# de-yang #  rnam gnyis / bdag-dang-gzhan #  gyi lus dang sprul pa'o / gzugs gtogs gnyis
rUpa avacara nirmANam dve rUpa sprazwa vyAyatane / tatra ganDa rasa aBAvAt / tat api dviviDam taTA eva / kAmaDAtO= idam caturviDam nirmANam evam rUpaDAtOH iti azwaviDam samAsatas nirmANam
# gzugs-na-spyod-pa # 'i sprul pa ni / de na dri dang ro med-pa # 'i phyir gzugs dang reg-bya # 'i skye-mched #  gnyis yin no / de-yang #  'dod-pa'i-khams #  kyi ji-lta-ba #  de-kho-na-bzhin-du #  rnam-pa-gnyis #  yin te / 'di ni sprul pa rnam-pa-bzhi #  yin no / gzugs-kyi-khams #  na yang de-dang-'dra-ba # s mdor-bsdu-na #  sprul pa ni rnam-pa-brgyad #  yin no

# gzugs-kyi-khams #  su skyes-pa #  'dod-pa-na-spyod-pa #  sprul pa na ji-ltar #  na dri dang ro dag dang mi-ldan-pa #  yang yin zhe na / gos dang rgyan bzhin-du #  mi ldan no / gzhan dag na re skye-mched #  gnyis sprul par byed do zhes zer ro

# yang ci mngon-par-shes-pa #  kho-na # s sprul pa sprul par byed dam zhe na / smras-pa # / ma yin no / 'o na ji-lta-bu #  zhe na / mngon-par-shes-pa # 'i 'bras-bu #

# bsam-gtan-dang-po # 'i 'bras-bu #  sprul pa'i sems ni gnyis te / 'dod-pa'i-khams #  dang bsam-gtan-dang-po # 'i sa dag go

# bsam-gtan-gnyis-pa # 'i 'bras-bu #  ni gsum ste / 'dod-pa'i-khams #  dang bsam-gtan-dang-po #  dang gnyis-pa # 'i sa pa dag go / da bzhin-du #  bsam-gtan #  gsum-pa #  dang bzhi-pa # 'i sa pa dag kyang bzhi dang lngar spyor bar bya'o

# bsam-gtan-gyi-'bras-bu #  sprul pa'i sems ni rang-gis #  pa dang sa-'og-ma #  yin par rig-par-bya # 'o / gong-ma #  las skyes min
na UrDva BUmikam nirmANa citta maDara DyAna Palam asti
# bsam-gtan #  'og ma'i 'bras-bu # s gong-ma # 'i sprul pa'i sems ni med do
dvitIya Adi DyAna Palam kAmAvacaram nirmANam praTama DyAna BUmikAt gatitaH viSizyate
# 'dod-pa-na-spyod-pa # 'i sprul pa bsam-gtan-gnyis-pa #  la-sogs-pa # 'i 'bras-bu #  ni / bsam-gtan-dang-po # 'i sa pa de'i 'bras-bu #  las 'gros kyi sgo nas khyad-par #  du 'phags so

SudDakAt cyAnAt antaram nirmANa cittam utpadyate nirmANa citta dvA na anyatas / tatas api te
# sprul pa'i sems ni bsam-gtan #  dag-pa #  pa'am sprul pa'i sems kyi mjug-thogs-su #  skye'i gzhan-du #  ni ma yin no / de-la # s gnyis
nirmANa cittAt api SudDakam DyAnam nirmANa cittam ca utpadyate na anyat
# sprul pa'i sems las kyang bsam-gtan #  dag-pa #  pa dang sprul pa'i sems skye ste / gzhan-du #  ni ma yin no
na hi samADi Pala sTa sTita sva apraviSya punar samADim tasmAt vyutTAnam asti / sarvasya ca nirmitasya / sva BUmikena nirmANam / na anya BUmikena nirmANa cittena anya BUmikam nirmANam nirmIyate
# ting-nge-'dzin #  gyi 'bras-bu-la-gnas-pa #  ni yang ting-nge-'dzin #  la ma zhugs-pa # r ting-nge-'dzin #  de-la # s ldang-ba #  med do / sprul pa thams-cad #  kyang / rang-gi #  sa pas sprul par byed / sa gzhan-pa # 'i sprul pa'i sems-kyis #  sa gzhan-pa # 'i sprul par ni mi byed do
BAzaNam tu aDareNa ca
# smrar 'jug-pa #  ni 'og mas kyang
sva BUmikena ca iti caSabdaH / kAmaDAtu praTama DyAna BUmikaH hi nirmitaH sva BUmikena eva cittena BAzyate / UrDva BUmikaH tu praTama DyAna BUmikena / UrDvam vijQapti samutTApaka aBAvAt / vahUnAm nirmitAnAm BAzaNam
# kyang zhes-bya-ba # 'i sgra ni rang-gi #  sa pas kyang smrar 'jug go zhes-bya-ba #  yin te / 'dod-pa'i-khams #  dang bsam-gtan-dang-po # 'i sa pa'i sprul pa ni rang-gis #  pa'i sems kho-na # s smrar 'jug go / sa-gong-ma-pa #  ni bsam-gtan-dang-po # 'i sa pa ste / yan-chad #  na rnam-par-rig-byed #  kun-nas-slong-ba # r byed-pa #  med-pa # 'i phyir ro / sprul pa mang-po #  rnams smra-ba #  ni ston min sprul pa dang bcas
nirmAtrA eva saha ASAstuH
# sangs-rgyas #  las gzhan-pa # 'i sprul pa ni sprul pa dang bcas te
budDAt anyasya nirmANam nirmAtrA saha BAzate / yadA ca vahavaH nirmitAH Bavanti tadA yugapad BAzante / ekasya BAzamANasya BAzante saha nirmitAH / ekasya tUzNIMBUtasya sarva uttUzNIm Bavanti te iti gATAH
# smra-ba # s gang-gi-tshe #  sprul pa mang-po-zhig #  yin pa de'i tshe cig-car #  smra ste / gcig cig smra-bar-byed-pa #  na / sprul pa thams-cad #  smra-ba # r byed / gcig mi-smra-ba # r gyur-pa #  dang / de-dag #  thams-cad #  smrar mi 'gyur / zhes tshigs su bcad de 'byung-ba # 'i phyir ro
budDasya pUrva paScAt vA yaTecCam nirmitAH BAzante
# sangs-rgyas #  kyi sprul pa ni snga-phyi #  ji-ltar-bzhed-pa # r smra'o
yadA BAzaNa cittam tadA nirmANa citta aBAvaH nirmANa citta aBAvAt nirmita aBAvaH iti kaTam enam BAzayanti / aDizWAya anya varttanAt
# gang-gi-tshe #  smrar 'jug-pa # 'i sems yod-pa #  de'i tshe sprul pa'i sems med-pa # 'i phyir sprul pa med na ji-ltar #  smrar 'jug ce na / byin gyis brlabs nas gzhan 'jug phyir

# ci gson po kho-na #  la byin gyi rlabs yod dam / 'on te shi-ba #  la yod ce na
mRtasya api asti aDizWAnam
# shi-ba #  la yang byin gyi rlabs yod
Arya mahAkaSyapa aDizWAnena tad asTi saMkala avasTAnAt / tat tu / na asTirasya / asTirasya tu BAvasya na asti aDizWAnam
# 'phags-pa #  'od srungs chen-po # 'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i rus-pa'i-keng-rus #  gnas-pa # 'i phyir ro / de-yang #  mi brtan la med / mi-brtan-pa # 'i dngos-po #  la ni byin gyi rlabs med de
Arya kASyapena mAMsa AdInAm aDhizWAnAt / apare tu na / apare punar AhuH na asti mRtasya aDizWAnam
# 'phags-pa #  'od srungs chen-po # s sha la-sogs-pa #  byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i phyir ro / gzhan dag min gzhan dag na re / shi-ba #  la byin gyi rlabs med kyi
asTi SaFkala avasTAnam tu devatA anuBAvAt iti
# rus-pa'i-keng-rus #  gnas-pa #  ni lha'i mthus so zhes zer ro
kim ekena cittena ekam eva nirmita nirmiNoti
# ci sems-gcig #  gis sprul pa gcig kho-na #  sprul-ba # r byed dam zhe na
AdO= ekam anekena jitAyAm tu viparyayAt
# dang-por #  du-ma # s gcig yin te / bya-ba # r gyur nas bzlog-pa # 'o
Aditas ekam nirmitam anekena nirmANa cittena nirmiNoti
# dang-po #  nyid-du #  ni sprul pa'i sems du-ma # s sprul pa gcig sprul par byed do
jitAyAm tu aBijQAyAm ekena cittena anekam nirmiNoti yAvat nirmAtumizwam Bavati
# mngon-par-shes-pa #  byang-na # s ni sems-gcig #  gis sprul pa po ji snyed dod pa du-ma #  sprul par byed do
aTa kim sarva nirmANa cittam avyAkRtam Bavati / avyAkRtam BAvanA jam / yat BAvanA Palam tat avaSyam avyAkRtam Bavati / triviDam tu upapatIjam
# yang sprul pa'i sems thams-cad #  lung-du-ma-bstan-pa #  yin nam zhe na / bsgoms las skyes-pa #  lung ma bstan / bsgoms-pa'i-'bras-bu #  gang-yin-pa #  de ni nges-par #  lung-du-ma-bstan-pa #  yin no / skye-ba #  las skyes rnam gsum mo

# lha dang klu dang sha za la-sogs-pa # 'i skye-ba # s thob-pa # 'i sprul pa'i sems ni dge-ba #  dang mi-dge-ba #  dang lung-du-ma-bstan-pa #  yin no

# de-dag #  gis byas-pa # 'i sprul-ba #  rang dang gzhan gyi lus dang 'brel-ba #  ni sgra med-pa # 'i gzugs-can #  gyi skye-mched #  yin pa'i phyir / skye-mched #  dug pa yin te
na tu indriyam nirmIyate / kim ezA eva dviviDardDi BAvanA mayI ca upapatti lABikA ca
# dbang-po #  dang tha-mi-dad-pa # 'i phyir ro / dbang-po #  ni sprul par mi byed do / ci bsgoms-pa-las-byung-ba #  dang skye-ba # s thob-pa # 'i rdzu-'phrul #  rnam-pa #  'di gnyis kho-nar #  zad dam zhe na
ezA ca dviviDA / RdDiH mantra OzaDAByAm ca karma jA ca iti paQcaDA
# rdzu-'phrul #  rnam-pa-gnyis #  pa de dang gsang-sngags #  sman dag dang las las skyes dang rnam-pa-lnga #
samAstas paQcaviDAm RdDim varNayanti
# rdzu-'phrul #  ni mdor-bsdu-na #  rnam-pa-lnga # 'o zhes brjod de
BAvanA Palam upapatti lABam mantra jAma OzaDa jAm karma jAm ca / yaTA mAnDAtuH antara aBavikAnAm ca / yat idam divya Srotram uktam cakzuH ca / kim ete divye eva Ahosvit divye eva divye
# bsgoms-pa'i-'bras-bu #  dang skye-ba # s thob-pa #  dang gsang-sngags #  las skyes-pa #  dang sman las skyes-pa #  dang las las skyes-pa #  ste / dper-na #  nga las nu dang srid-pa #  bar-ma #  pa rnams kyi lta-bu # 'o / lha'i-rna-ba #  dang mig tu bshad-pa #  gang-yin-pa #  de-dag #  ci lha'i kho-na #  yin nam
yaTA boDisattva cakravarti gRhapati ratnAnAm / divya Srotra akziNI / yasmAt te / rUpa prasAdO DyAna BUmikO
# 'on te byang-chub-sems-dpa' #  dang 'khor-los-sgyur-ba #  dang khyim-bdag-rin-po-che #  rnams kyi lta-bu # r lha'i dang 'dra-ba # s lha'i yin zhe na / lha yi mig dang rna-ba #  yin / 'di-ltar #  de gnyis ni
DyAna samApannasya Sabda Aloka ABoga prayogeNa DyAna BUmikAni BUtAni upAdAya rUprUpa prasAdO nirvartete cakzuH Srotra sAmantake rUpa SabdyoH darSana SravaNa hetU iti DyAna BUmika tvAt divye eva te cakzuH Srotre / te ca punar
# bsam-gtan #  sa pa'i gzugs-dang-ba # / bsam-gtan #  la snyoms-par-zhugs-pa # 'i mig dang rna-ba # 'i thod kor du sgra dang snang-ba #  la gtod-pa # 'i sbyor-ba # s bsam-gtan #  gyis pa'i 'byung-ba #  rnams rgyur-byas-pa'i-gzugs #  dang sgra dag mthong-ba #  dang thos-pa # 'i rgyu mngon-par-'grub-pa # s bsam-gtan #  gyis pa yin pa'i phyir mig dang rna-ba #  de-dag #  ni lha'i kho-na #  yin no

# lha'i-mig #  dang rna-ba #  ni rtag-tu #  rnam-par-shes-pa #  dang bcas-pa #  yin pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs-pa #  med do / zhar ba dang 'on-pa #  med-pa # 'i phyir ma-tshang-ba #  yang ma yin te
rUpa avacara sattva vat / dUra sUkzmavatAni api rUpANi SabDAH ca tayioH vizyaH / Aha ca atra / dUra sTam AvRtam sUkzmam sarvatas ca na paSyati / mAMsa cakzuH yatas rUpam atas divyam dRS izyate / kiyat dUram punar divyena cakzuzA paSyati

yasya yAdRSam cakzuH Bavati
# gang-gi #  mig ji-lta-bu #  yin ba'o
SrAvaka pratyekabudDa budDAH tu anaBhi saMskAreNa sAhasra dvi sAhasra tri sAhasrakAn lokaDAtUn yaTAsaMKyam paSyanti / aBisaMskAreNa tu

# nyan-thos #  chen-po # s kyang mngon-par-'du-byed-pa #  thams-cad-kyi # s lha'i-mig #  gis stong-gnyis #  pa'i 'jig-rten-gyi-khams #  mthong ngo / bse ru lta-bu # s ni stong-gsum-pa #  mthong ngo

# 'on te gzhan-yang #  yin zhe na / gzhan-yang #  skye-ba # s kyang 'thob
divya Srotra Adikam api catuzwayam upapatti pratilaByam asti
# lha'i-rna-ba #  la-sogs-pa #  bzhi yang skye-ba # s 'thob bar bya-ba #  yod mod kyi

# skye-ba # s thob-pa #  ni cung-zad #  kyang mngon-par-shes-pa # 'i ming mi 'thob bo / skye-ba # s 'thob-pa # 'i lha'i-mig #  gang-yin-pa # / des ni / srid-pa #  bar-ma #  mi mthong ngo

# skye-ba # s thob-pa #  ni ma yin no

upapatti Aptam iti vartate
# skye-ba # s 'thob-pa #  zhes-bya-ba # r sbyar te
para citta jQAnam tu upapatti pratilabDam triviDam veditavyam kuSala akuSala avyAkRtam / tarkavi dyAkRtam ca yat
# pha rol gyi sems shes-pa #  skye-ba # s 'thob-pa #  de ni dge-ba #  dang mi-dge-ba #  dang lung-du-ma-bstan-pa #  dang rnam-pa-gsum #  yin par rig-par-bya # 'o / gang rtogs dang rig-sngags #  kyis byas-pa # 'ang

anya gati sTA nityam jAnate
# 'gro-ba-gzhan #  na gnas-pa # s ni rtag-tu #  shes so

# chos-mngon-pa #  mdzod kyi rnam-pa # r bshad-pa #  las ye shes bstan-pa #  zhes-bya-ba #  mdzod kyi gnas bdun pa'o / shes-pa # 'i skabs kyis shes-pa # 'i rang-bzhin #  gyi yon-tan #  rnams ni bshad-zin #  to / rang-bzhin #  gzhan rnams brjod-pa # r bya ste / de-lta-bas-na #  yon-tan-thams-cad #  kyi rten yin pa'i phyir dang-po-kho-nar #  bsam-gtan #  rnams brtsams te / bsam-gtan #  dag ni rnam-pa-gnyis #

# 'jig-rten #  bstan-pa # 'i mdzod kyi gnas su / der skye-ba #  dag rab tu bshad
kaTam proktAH / pRTak pRTak
# ji-skad-du #  bshad ce na / der so-so # 'i
DyAnam tri BUmikam tatra caturTa tu azwa BUmikam iti / samApatti DyAnam tu vaktavyam / atas ucyate / samApattiH SuBEkAgyram
# bsam-gtan #  sa ni gsum-pa #  yin / bzhi-pa #  sa ni brgyad pa yin / zhes-bya-ba #  yin no / snyoms-par-'jug-pa # 'i bsam-gtan #  brjod-pa # r bya ste / de'i-phyir #  smras-pa # / snyoms 'jug dge-ba #  rtse gcig pa

# bye-brag-med-par #  dge-ba'i-sems #  rtse gcig pa ni bsam-gtan #  yin te / ting-nge-'dzin #  gyi rang-bzhin #  yin pa'i phyir ro
paQca skanDAH tu sa anugam

# de lta na ni 'o na sems dmigs-pa-gcig-pa #  dag kho-na #  ting-nge-'dzin #  yin gyi chos gzhan sems-las-byung-ba #  ni ma yin no zhes-bya-ba # r 'gyur ro zhe na

# sems rnams kho-na #  ting-nge-'dzin #  ma yin gyi gang-gis #  de-dag #  rtse gcig par byed-pa # 'i chos de ting-nge-'dzin #  yin la de nyid rtse gcig pa nyid yin no

# ting-nge-'dzin #  stobs chung-ba # 'i phyir ro

# gzhan dag na re sems rtse gcig pa dag kho-na #  ting-nge-'dzin #  yin te

DyAnam iti kaH arTaH / DyAyanti anena iti / prajAnanti iti arTaH / samAhita cittasya yaTA BUta prajQAnAt / cintana arTaH hi eza DAtuH
# bsam-gtan #  zhes-bya-ba # 'i don ci zhe na / 'dis sems-par-byed-pa # s na bsam-gtan #  te / sems-mnyam-pa # r bzhag na yang-dag-pa #  ji-lta-ba #  bzhin rab-tu-shes-pa # 'i phyir rab-tu-shes-pa # r byed ces bya-ba # 'i tha-tshig #  ste / skad kyi byings 'di ni sems-pa # 'i don yin la

# ro myang-ba #  dang mtshungs-par-ldan-pa #  rnams dang dag-pa #  pa rnams dang zag-pa-med-pa #  rnams so / brgyad pa rnam-pa-gnyis #

# srid-pa # 'i rtse mo ni ro myang-ba #  dang mtshungs-par-ldan-pa #  dang dag-pa #  pa yin gyi zag-pa-med-pa #  ni med do / de-la #

# 'jig-rten-las-'das-pa # 'i snyoms-par-'jug-pa # 'i rdzas gang-yin-pa #  de ni zag-pa-med-pa #  yin no snyoms-par-'jug-pa # 'i rdzas de-dag #  las bsam-gtan #  rnams kho-na #  yan-lag #  dang ldan-pa #  yin gyi gzugs-med-pa #  rnams ni ma yin no / de-la #  dang-po #  la lnga / bsam-gtan #  po la yan-lag-lnga #  ste

# rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dang dga'-ba-dang-bde-ba #  dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid de / de-ltar-na #  de-dag #  ni yan-lag-lnga #  yin no / ting-nge-'dzin #  ni yan-lag #  kyang yin la bsam-gtan #  yang yin no / lhag-ma #  rnams ni yan-lag #  dag yin no zhes grag go

# yan-lag #  bzhi-pa # 'i dmag ji-lta-ba # r yan-lag-lnga # 'i bsam-gtan #  yang de dang 'dra'o

# gnyis-pa #  la ni yan-lag #  bzhi / rab dang dad ni dga' la sogs
dvitIye DyAne catvAri aFgAni
# bsam-gtan-gnyis-pa #  la yan-lag #  bzhi ste

# nang rab tu dang-ba #  dang dga'-ba-dang-bde-ba #  dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid do
tRtIye paQca tu upekzA smRtiH prajQA suKam sTitiH / tRtIye tu DyAne paQcAFgAni / upekzA smRtiH saMprajQAnam suKam smADiH ca / samADi paryAyaH hi sTitiH / samyak samADiH katamaH / yA cittasya sTitiH iti sUtre vacanAt
# gsum-pa #  la lnga btang-snyoms #  dang / dran dang shes-rab #  bde dang gnas / bsam-gtan #  gsum-pa #  la yang yan-lag-lnga #  ste / btang-snyoms #  dang dran-pa #  dang shes-bzhin #  dang bden-pa #  dang ting-nge-'dzin #  to / gnas-pa #  ni ting-nge-'dzin #  gyi rnam-grangs #  yin te / mdo las / yang-dag-pa # 'i ting-nge-'dzin #  gang zhe na / gang sems-gnas-pa #  dang yang-dag-par-gnas-pa # 'o zhes 'byung-ba # 'i phyir ro
catvAri ante asuKAH duHKa upekzA smRti samADayaH / caturTam DyAnam antyam / tatra catvAri aFgAni
# mtha' na bzhi dran btang-snyoms #  dang / bde min sdug min ting 'dzin rnams / mtha' ma ni bsam-gtan-bzhi-pa # 'o / de-la #  yan-lag #  bzhi ste
aduHKa asuKA vedanA upekzA pariSudDiH smRti pariSudDiH samADiH ca
# bde-ba #  yang ma yin sdug-bsngal #  yang ma-yin-pa # 'i tshor-ba #  dang btang-snyoms #  yongs-su-dag-pa #  dang dran-pa #  yongs-su-dag-pa #  dang ting 'dzin yongs-su-dag-pa # 'o

# dang-po #  dang gsum-pa #  dag la ni yan-lag-lnga #  yin pa'i phyir dang gnyis-pa #  dang bzhi-pa #  dag la ni yan-lag #  bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro / ming gi sgo nas ni de lta'o / rdzas su bcu gcig / rdzas su ni de-dag #  bcu gcig yin te / bsam-gtan-dang-po #  la lnga'o

# gsum-pa #  la ni btang-snyoms #  dang dran-pa #  dang shes-bzhin #  dang bde-ba #  rnams so
caturTe aduHKa asuKA vedanA iti
# bzhi-pa #  la bde-ba #  yang ma yin sdug-bsngal #  yang ma-yin-pa # 'i tshor-ba # 'o
atas eva ucyate yAni aFgAni praTame DyAne dvitIye api tAni iti catuzkowikam / praTamA kowiH vitarka vicArO
# de nyid kyi phyir smras-pa # / yan-lag #  gang dag bsam-gtan-dang-po #  na yod-pa #  de-dag #  gnyis-pa #  na yang yod dam zhe na / mu-bzhi #  ste / mu dang-po #  ni rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dag go

# 'di-ltar #  de'i bde-ba #  ni tshor-ba #  yin la / bsam-gtan-dang-po #  na / shin-tu-sbyangs-pa #  bde-ba #  yin
praTama dvitIyayoH tu DyAnayoH prasrabDi suKam iti uktam

# 'di-la #  ni shin-tu-sbyangs-pa #  bde-ba #  yin la / de-la #  ni tshor-ba #  bde-ba #  yin no zhes-bya-ba #  'di ga las shes she na

na hi tat tayoH kAyikam yujyate

samApannasya vijQAna kAya aBAvAt
# snyoms-par-zhugs-pa #  la rnam-par-shes-pa # 'i tshogs lnga med-pa # 'i phyir ro

na ca suKsuKa sOmanasya yoH yOgapadyam asti / na ca api tayoH paryAyeNa DyAne vRttiH yuktA paQcAFga vacanAt iti / apare punar AhuH
# bde-ba #  dang yid-bde-ba #  gnyis cig-car-'byung-ba #  med do / de gnyis rnam-grangs #  kyis bsam-gtan #  na yod-pa # r yang rigs-pa #  ma yin te / yan-lag-lnga #  zhes 'byung-ba # 'i phyir ro
na asti eva cEtasikam suKa indriyam trizu api hi DyAnezu
# gzhan dag na re sems-las-byung-ba # 'i bde-ba # 'i dbang-po #  ni kho-na #  ste

# bsam-gtan #  gsum char na yang lus kyi bde-ba #  kho-na #  yan-lag #  tu rnam-pa # r gzhag go zhes zer ro
yat tarhi sutre uktam suKa indriyam katamat / yat suKa vedanIyena sparSena spRzwasya utpadyate kAyikam cEtasikam sAtam veditam vedanA gatam idam ucyate suKa indriyam iti / aDyAropitaH eza pAWaH / kena api sarva nikAya antarezu kAyikam iti eva pAWAt / suKam ca kAyena pratisaMvedayate iti sva Sabdena vacanAt ca / manaskAyena iticet / evam uktvA kaH guNaH
# 'o na mdo las / bde-ba # 'i dbang-po #  gang zhe na bde-ba-myong-ba # r 'gyur-ba # 'i reg-pa # s reg-pa #  na lus kyi dang sems-las-byung-ba # 'i tshor-ba # 'i rnam-pa #  bde-ba #  sim-pa #  skye-ba #  gang-yin-pa #  de ni bde-ba # 'i dbang-po #  zhes-bya'o #  zhes gang gsungs-pa #  ji-lta-bu #  zhe na / tshig de ni 'ga' zhig gis sgro-btags-pa #  yin te / sde-pa #  gzhan thams-cad-la # s lus kyi zhes-bya-ba #  kho-na #  'byung-ba # 'i phyir dang bde-ba #  lus-kyis #  myong la zhes rang-gi #  sgras gsungs-pa # 'i phyir ro / gal-te #  yid-kyi-lus #  kyis so zhe na ni / de-skad #  bshad-pa #  la yon-tan #  ci-zhig #  yod
caturTe DyAne prasrabDi BUyastve api suKa avacanAt ca
# bsam-gtan-bzhi-pa #  la shin-tu-sbyangs-pa #  mang bzhin-du #  bde-ba #  ma smos-pa # 'i yang phyir ro
suKa vedanA anukUlA prasrabDiH suKam iti ced
# gal-te #  bde-ba'i-tshor-ba #  dang mthun-pa # 'i shin-tu-sbyangs-pa #  bde-ba #  yin no zhe na ni
tRtIye prasrabDi suKa avacanam kasmAt
# gsum-pa #  na yod-pa # 'i shin-tu-sbyangs-pa #  bde-ba # r ma gsungs-pa #  yang ci'i-phyir #
upekza upahata tvAt iti ced
# gal-te #  btang-snyoms #  kyis bcom-pa # 'i phyir ro zhe na
na upekzayA eva tad vRdDiH / pUrvikAByaH tad viSezAt
# ma yin te / snga-ma #  gnyis-pa # s de khyad-par-du-'phags-pa # s btang-snyoms #  kho-na # s de 'phel-ba # 'i phyir ro
yasmin samaye Arya SrAvakaH praviveka jAm prItim kAyena sAkzAtkRtvA upasaMpadya viharati iti atra sUtre prasrabDi suKayoH pRTak vacanAt na prasrabDiH eva suKam
# gang-gi-tshe #  'phags-pa #  nyan-thos #  rab-tu-dben-pa # 'i bde-ba #  lus-kyis #  mngon-sum-du-byas-nas #  rdzogs-pa # r byas te gnas-pa #  zhes 'byung-ba # 'i mdo 'di-las #  kyang shin-tu-sbyangs-pa #  dang bde-ba #  gnyis tha-dad-pa # r 'byung-ba # 'i phyir shin-tu-sbyangs-pa #  kho-na #  bde-ba #  ma yin no
samApannasya kaTam kAya vijQAnam iti ced
# gal-te #  snyoms-par-zhugs-pa #  la ji-ltar #  lus kyi rnam-par-shes-pa #  'byung zhe na
samADi viSeza jena prasrabDi saMjQakena suKsuKa vedanIyena vAyunA kAya sPuraNAt
# ting-nge-'dzin #  gyi khyad-par #  las skyes-pa #  shin-tu-sbyangs-pa #  zhes-bya-ba #  bde-ba-myong-ba # r 'gyur-ba # 'i rlung gis lus la rgyas-pa # 'i phyir ro
bahis vikzepAH samADi braMSaH iti ced / na
# gal-te #  phyi-rol-du #  rnam-pa # r g-yengs pa'i phyir ting-nge-'dzin #  las nyams-pa # r 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te
samADi jasya antaHkAya saMBUtasya kAya suKasya samADi anukUla tvAt
# ting-nge-'dzin #  las skyes-pa #  lus kyi bde-ba #  nang-du #  'byung-ba'i-lus #  kyi bde-ba #  ni ting-nge-'dzin #  dang mthun-pa # 'i phyir ro

# gal-te #  lus kyi rnam-par-shes-pa #  skyes-pa # 'i tshe langs-pa # r 'gyur ro zhe na / ma yin te / de nyid kyi phyir ro
kAma avacareNa kAya indriyeNa rUpa avacara sprazwavya vijQAna anutpattiH iti ced / na
# gal-te #  'dod-pa-na-spyod-pa # 'i lus kyi dbang-po # s gzugs-na-spyod-pa # 'i reg-bya #  la rnam-par-shes-pa #  mi skye'o zhe na / ma yin te
prasrabDi vijQAnasya utpatteH
# shin-tu-sbyangs-pa # 'i rnam-par-shes-pa #  skye-ba # 'i phyir ro
anAsrave api sprazwavya kAya vijQAne syAtAm / mA BUt kiQci daFgam sa Asravam kiQcid anAsravam iti ced / kAyika prasrabDi yoDyaFga vacanAt
# gal-te #  yan-lag #  cung-zad-cig #  ni zag-pa-dang-bcas-pa #  cung-zad-cig #  ni zag-pa-med-pa #  yin na mi-rung-ba # s reg-bya #  dang lus kyi rnam-par-shes-pa #  zag-pa-med-pa #  dag tu yang 'gyur ro zhe na / lus-shin-tu-sbyangs-pa #  yang dag byang-chub-kyi-yan-lag #  tu gsungs-pa # s 'dod-pa'i-phyir #  ro

# gal-te #  byang-chub-kyi-yan-lag #  dang mthun-pa # 'i phyir ro zhe na ni zag-pa-med-pa #  nyid kyang de dang 'dra'o
sa AsravAH DarmAH katame / cakzuH yAvat eva sprazwavyam iti asya sUtrasya viroDAt iti ced / na
# gal-te #  zag-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'i chos-rnams #  gang zhe na / mig ji-snyed-pa #  zhes 'byung-ba # 'i mdo 'di dang 'gal lo zhe na / ma yin te
anyasprazwavya kAya vijQAna aBisaMDi vacanAt

na ca anAsrave kiQcid aFgam sa Asravam kicit anAsravam syAt iti ced
# gal-te #  zag-pa-med-pa #  la yan-lag #  cung-zad-cig #  ni zag-pa #  dang bcas ba cung-zad-cig #  ni zag-pa-med-pa # r 'gyur-ba #  ma yin nam zhe na

# cig-car #  ma-yin-pa # 'i phyir nyes-pa #  ci-zhig #  yod / gal-te #  bde-ba #  dang dga'-ba #  phrad-pa #  med-pa # 'i phyir yan-lag-lnga #  par mi 'gyur ro zhe na
na saMBavavam pratyupadeSAt vitarka vicAra vat / sADyam iti ced

sidDam cittasya OdArika sUkzma tayoH viroDAt doza avacanAt ca

tasmAt yAni eva praTama DyAne paQcAFgAni tezAm dvi tri caturaFga apakarzeNa dvitIya Adi DyAna vyavasTAnam
# de-lta-bas-na #  bsam-gtan-dang-po #  la yod-pa # 'i yan-lag-lnga #  po gang dag yin pa de-dag #  kho-na #  las yan-lag #  gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi bor nas bsam-gtan #  gnyis ba la-sogs-pa #  rnam-pa # r gzhag go
atas eva ca praTame DyAne paQcAnAm aFga tvam uktam
# de nyid kyi phyir bsam-gtan-dang-po #  la ni yan-lag-lnga #  nyid-du #  bshad la
tad apakarzeNa uttara DyAna vyavasTApanAt / na tu saMjQA AdInAm aFga tvam uktam / kim arTa vA paQcAnAm eva aFga tvam uktam / upakAraka tvAt iti ced / na
# de-dag #  las thor bas ni bsam-gtan #  phyi-ma #  rnam-par-gzhag-pa # 'i phyir 'du-shes #  la-sogs-pa #  ni ma yin no / yang-na #  ci'i-phyir #  lnga kho-na #  yan-lag #  nyid yin / gal-te #  phan-pa # 'i phyir ro zhe na / ma yin te

# 'o na ni de rdzas gzhan ma-yin-pa # s ji-ltar #  na rdzas su yan-lag #  bcu gcig yin / de-lta-bas-na # / rab tu dang-ba #  dad-pa #  yin / de ni bsam-gtan-gnyis-pa #  thob-pa # 'i phyir mnyam-par-gzhag-pa # 'i sa las nges-par-'byung-ba #  la yid ches ba skye ste

na eva hi vitarka vicAra samADayaH na api aDAtma saMprasAdaH dravya antarANi iti apare / kaTam asati dravya antara tve cEtasika tvam sidDi ati / avasTA visesaH hi nAma cetasaH cetasikaH Bavati / na tu eza Sastra sidDAntaH / kaTam idam gamyate / kim anyat Bavatu / yaTA icCanti nikAya antarIyAH Darma antaram eva ca etasikam prItiH / sOmanasyam tu trizu api DyAnezu suKam iti
# gzhan dag na re rtog-pa-dang-dpyod-pa #  dang ting-nge-'dzin #  rnams kyang rdzas gzhan ma yin la nang rab tu dang-ba #  yang rdzas gzhan ma yin no / rdzas gzhan med na ji-ltar #  sems las byung pa nyid-du #  'grub ce na / sems-can-gyi-gnas #  skabs kyi bye-brag #  kyang sems-las-byung-ba #  yin no zhes zer te / 'di ni bstan-bcos #  kyi grub-pa # 'i mtha' ma yin no / dga'-ba #  ni yid-bde-ba #  yin no zhes gang bshad-pa #  'di ji-ltar #  khong du chud / gzhan ci-zhig #  yin / ji-ltar #  sde-pa #  gzhan dag 'dod-pa #  lta-bu #  yin no
