evam anya DyAna Arupya anantaram daSa dravyANi yojyAni / eza tu saMkzepaH
# de-bzhin-du #  bsam-gtan #  dang gzugs-med-pa #  gzhan gyi mjug-thogs-su #  yang rdzas bcu sbyar-ba # r bya'o / 'di ni mdor bsdu-ba #  yin te
tRtIya Adya avadUrDva aDas anAsrava anantaram SuBam / utpadyate / SuBa grahaNena SudDam anAsravam ca gRhyate kuSala tvAt anAsravasya samApatti dravyasya anantaram sva BUmike ca SudDAn Asrave utpadyete / UrDva aDas BUmike ca tRtIvAt yAvat
# zag-pa-med-pa # 'i mjug-thogs-su # / ltag 'og gsum-pa # 'i bar dge-ba #  skye-ba # 'o / dge-ba #  smos-pa #  ni dag-pa #  ba dang zag-pa-med-pa #  gzung ste / dge-ba #  yin pa'i phyir ro / zag-pa-med-pa # 'i snyoms-par-'jug-pa # 'i rdzas kyi mjug-thogs-su #  rang-gi #  sa pa dang sa god ma dang 'og ma sa gsum-pa # 'i bar gyi dag-pa #  pa dang zag-pa-med-pa #  skye ste
vyutkrAntaka samApattAraH hi tRtIyAt pareNa laFGayitum na utsahante
# thod rgal du snyoms-par-'jug-pa # r byed-pa # s gsum-pa #  las phan chad du ni rgal-ba # r mi nus so
anvayajQAn anantaram cArupyAn samApadyante na DarmDarma jQAna anantaram
# rjes-su-shes-pa # 'i mjug-thogs-su #  gzugs-med-pa #  la snyoms-pa # r 'jug gi chos-shes-pa # 'i mjug-thogs-su #  ni ma yin te
tasya aDara ASraya Alambana tvAt iti
# de'i rten dang dmigs-pa #  'og ma-yin-pa # 'i phyir ro
yaTA ca anAsravAt anantaram uktam veditavyam / taTA SudDAt kliwam ca api sva BUmikam
# ji-ltar #  zag-pa-med-pa # 'i mjug-thogs-su #  bshad-pa #  ltar dag-pa #  las de-bzhin # / rig-par-bya #  la / rang-gi #  sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang
sva BUmikam klizwam aDikam SudDakAt anantaram utpadyate
# dag-pa #  pa'i mjug-thogs-su #  lhag-pa # r rang-gis #  pa'i nyon-mongs-pa-can #  skye'o
Sezam yaTA eva anAsravAt / anAsravasya hi samanantaram klizwa utpattiH na asti iti / klizwAt svam SudDakam klizwam
# lhag-ma #  ni zag-pa-med-pa #  las bshad-pa #  ji-lta-ba #  bzhin no / zag-pa-med-pa # 'i mjug-thogs-su #  ni nyon-mongs-pa-can #  skye-ba #  med do / nyon mongs can las rang dag dang
klizwAt samApatti dravyAt anantaram sva BUmike SudDaka klizwe utpadyete / evam ca aDara SudDakam
# nyon-mongs-pa-can #  gyi snyoms-par-'jug-pa # 'i rdzas kyi mjug-thogs-su #  ni rang-gi #  sa pa'i dag-pa #  ba dang nyon-mongs-pa-can #  dag skye'o / 'og ma'i dag cig kyang
kleSa utpaIXitaH hi aDaram api samApattim SudDakam bahu manyate
# nyon-mongs-pa # s gzir-ba #  ni 'og ma'i snyoms-par-'jug-pa # 'i dag-pa #  pa la yang dga'-ba # r 'gyur ro
yadi klizwam paricCidya aDas saMcarati / kuSalAt saMcaritaH Bavati na klizwAt
# gal-te #  nyon-mongs-pa-can #  yongs su bcad nas 'og mar 'phon ni dge-ba #  las 'phos-pa #  yin gyi nyon-mongs-pa-can #  las ni ma yin no
aTa aparicCidya kaTam saMcarati
# 'on te yongs su ma bcad na ni ji-ltar #  'pho zhe na
pUrvAveDAt pUrvam hi saH eva aFkAmaH Bavati varam aDastAt SudDakam na uparizwAt klizwam iti
# sngon 'phangs-pa # 'i phyir te / sngon 'di snyam-du #  'og ma'i dag-pa #  ba ni bla'i gong-ma # 'i nyon-mongs-pa-can #  ni ma yin no snyam-du #  'dod-pa # r 'gyur la
pUrva aBiprAyam ca saMtatiH anuvartate sattvAnAm
# sngon gyi bsam-pa #  yang sems-can #  rnams kyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brangs te
praNiDAya suptasya aBipreta kAla praboDa vat
# bsams nas gnyid-log-pa # r 'dod-pa # 'i dus-su #  sad-pa #  bzhin no
anAsravam tu klizwAt anantaram sarvaTA na utpadyate
# zag-pa-med-pa #  ni nyon-mongs-pa-can #  gyi mjug-thogs-su #  rnam-pa-thams-cad-du #  mi skye'o
samApatti kAlam pratyeta yuktam / SudDakAt klizwAt ca samanantaram sva BUmikam eva klizwam utpadyate na anya BUmikam iti / cyutO tu SudDakAt klizwam sarvam
# snyoms-par-'jug-pa # 'i dus kyi phyir dag-pa #  pa dang nyon-mongs-pa-can #  gyi mjug-thogs-su #  rang-gi #  sa pa'i nyon-mongs-pa-can #  kho-na #  skye'i gzhan gyi sa pa ni ma yin no zhes de-skad #  du bshad kyi / 'chi-'pho #  dag las nyon mongs kun
cyuti kAle tu upapatti lABikAt SudDakAt anantaram sarva BUmikam klizwam utpadyate
# 'chi-'pho-ba # 'i tshe skye-ba # s thob-pa # 'i dag-pa #  pa'i mjug-thogs-su #  sa-thams-cad-pa # 'i nyon-mongs-pa-can #  skye'o
klizwAt tu na uttaram
# nyon mongs can las gong-ma #  min
klizwAt tu DyAna ArUpyAt anantaram cyuti kAle svADara BUmikam klizwam utpadyate / na UrDva BUmikam
# 'chi-'pho-ba # 'i tshe nyon-mongs-pa-can #  gyi bsam-gtan #  dang gzugs-med-pa # 'i mjug-thogs-su #  rang-gi #  sa pa dang sa-'og-ma-pa # 'i nyon-mongs-pa-can #  skye'i sa-gong-ma-pa #  ni ma yin no
na ca sarvasmAt SudDa kAdana aSravam samApatti dravyam utpadyate / kim tarhi
# dag-pa #  pa thams-cad-la # s zag-pa-med-pa # 'i snyoms-par-'jug-pa # 'i rdzas skye-ba #  yang ma yin no / 'o na ji-lta-bu #  zhe na
caturDA SudDakam hAna BAgIya Adi
# dag-pa #  nyams-pa # 'i cha mthun sogs / rnam bzhi
hAnaBAgIyam viSeza BAgIyam sTiti BAgIyam nirveDa BAgIyam iti caturviDam SudDakam
# dag-pa #  pa ni nyams-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa #  dang gnas-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa #  dang khyad-par #  gyi cha-dang-mthun-pa #  dang nges-par-'byed-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa #  dang rnam-pa-bzhi # 'o
Bava agram tu triviDam anyatra viSezviSeza BAgIyAt / kim asya lakzaNam / yaTAkramam
# srid-pa # 'i rtse mo ni rnam-pa-gsum #  yin te / khyad-par #  gyi cha-dang-mthun-pa #  ma gtogs so / 'di'i mtshan-nyid #  ci zhe na / de ni go-rims-bzhin-du #
kleSa utpatti sva BUmi UrDva anAsrava anuguNam hi tat
# nyon mongs skye dang rang sa dang / gong dang zag med rjes mthun-pa # 'o
kleSa utpatti anuguNam hAna BAgIyam sva BUmi anuguNam sTiti BAgIyam UrDva BUmi anuguNam viSeza BAgIyam anAsrava anuguNam nirveDa BAgIyam
# nyams-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa #  ni nyon-mongs-pa #  skye-ba #  dang rjes-su-mthun-pa # 'o / gnas-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa #  ni rang-gi #  sa dang rjes-su-mthun-pa # 'o / khyad-par-can #  gyi cha dang rjes-su-mthun-pa #  ni sa-gong-ma #  dang rjes-su-mthun-pa # 'o / nges-par-'byed-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa #  ni zag-pa-med-pa # 'i rjes-su-mthun-pa #  ste
tasmAt anAsravam utpadyate
# zag-pa-med-pa #  ni de-la # s skye'o
aTa ezAm caturNA kati kasmAt anantaram utpadyante / dve trINi trINi ca ekam ca hAna BAga Adi anantaram / hAnaBAgIyam hAna BAj / tasmAt anantaram dve utpadyete
# yang bzhi-po #  de-dag #  las gang-gi #  mjug-thogs-su #  du zhig skye zhe na / nyams cha mthun sogs mjug-thogs-su # / gnyis dang gsum dang gsum dang gcig / nyams-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa #  nyi nyams-pa #  dang brten-pa # 'o / de'i-mjug-thogs-su #  ni gnyis skye ste
hAni sTiti BAgIye / sTiti BAgIya anantaram trINi anyatra nirveDa BAgIyAt
# nyams-pa #  dang gnas-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa #  dag go / gnas-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa # 'i mjug-thogs-su #  ni gsum ste / nges-par-'byed-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa #  ma gtogs so
viSeza BAgIyAt anantaram trINi anyatra hAna BAgIyAt nirveDa BAgIyAt anantaram tat eva ekam iti
# khyad-par-can #  gyi cha-dang-mthun-pa # 'i mjug-thogs-su #  ni gsum ste / nyams-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa #  ma gtogs so / nges-par-'byed-pa # 'i cha-dang-mthun-pa # 'i mjug-thogs-su #  ni gcig ste
kaTam vyutkrAntaka samApattiH utpadyate
# de gcig-pu #  skye'o / thod rgal gyi snyoms-par-'jug-pa #  ji-ltar #  skye zhe na
gatvA Agamya dviDA BUmIH azwO Slizwa eka laFGitAH
# sa brgyad rnam gnyis 'brel-ba #  dang / gcig rgal song zhing 'ongs-na # s ni
vyutkrAntaka samApattiH visaBAga tRtIya gA / gatvA iti anulomam samApadya / Agamya iti pratilomam samApadya / dviDA iti sa Asrava anAsravAH BUmIH / azwO= iti DyAna Arupya samApattIH / SlizwAH iti anukrameNa / ekalaFGitAH iti ekAm utkramya
# ris mi-mthun-pa #  gsum-pa # r 'gor / thod rgal gyi ni snyoms 'jug yin / sa brgyad ces bya-ba #  ni bsam-gtan #  dang gzugs-med-pa # 'i snyoms-par-'jug-pa #  rnams so / rnam gnyis zhes-bya-ba #  ni zag-pa-dang-bcas-pa #  dang zag-pa-med-pa # 'o / 'brel-pa #  dang zhes-bya-ba #  ni go-rims-bzhin-du # 'o / gcig rgal zhes-bya-ba #  ni re-re #  rgal nas so / song zhing zhes-bya-ba #  ni lugs dang mthun-par #  snyoms-pa # r zhugs nas so / 'ongs-na # s zhes-bya-ba #  ni lugs dang mi-mthun-pa # r snyoms-pa # r bzhugs nas so
sa AsravAH azwO BUmiH anuloma pratiloma samApattitaH nirjitya anAsravAH ca sapta
# zag-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'i sa brgyad dang zag-pa-med-pa # 'i sa bdun lugs dang mthun-pa #  dang lugs dang mi-mthun-pa # 'i snyoms-par-'jug-pa # 'i sgo nas byang-ba # r byas-na # s
paScAt sa AsravAt praTamAt DyAnAt sa Asravam tRtIyam samApadyate
# phyis zag-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'i bsam-gtan-dang-po #  nas zag-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'i gsum-pa #  la snyoms-pa # r 'jug cing
tasmAt AkASa Anantya Ayatanam tasmAt AkMicanya avatanam
# de nas ni nam-mkha' #  mtha' yas skye-mched #  la
evam punar pratilomam nirjitya anAsravAH api ekalaFGitAH anulomapratilomam ca samApadyate / ayam prayogaH vyutkrAntaka samApatteH
# de nas ni ci-yang-med-pa # 'i skye-mched #  la snyoms-pa # r 'jug go / de-bzhin-du #  lugs dang mi-mthun-pa #  yang byang-ba # r byas-na # s zag-pa-med-pa #  rnams kyang re-re #  rgal zhing lugs dang mthun-pa #  dang lugs dang mi-mthun-pa # r snyoms-par-'jug-pa #  ni thod rgal du snyoms-par-'jug-pa # 'i sbyor-ba #  yin no
yadA tu praTama AtAsa AsravAt tRtIyam anAsravam DyAnam samApadyate tasmAt sa asram AkASa AnantyAyatanam tasmAt anAsravam AkiQca nyAyatanam
# gang-gi-tshe #  zag-pa-dang-bcas-pa #  dang-po #  nas zag-pa-med-pa # 'i bsam-gtan #  gsum-pa #  la snyoms-pa # r 'jug cing / de nas ni zag-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'i nam-mkha' #  mtha' yas skye-mched #  la / de nas ni zag-pa-med-pa # 'i ci-yang-med-pa # 'i skye-mched #  la snyoms-pa # r 'jug cing
evam punar pratilomam / tadA visaBAga tRtIya dravya gamanAt aBinizpannA Bavati
# de-bzhin-du #  lugs dang mi-mthun-pa # r yang snyoms-par-'jug-pa #  de'i tshe ris mi-mthun-pa # 'i rdzas gsum-pa # r 'gro-ba # 'i phyir / mngon-par-grub-pa #  yin no
ati viprakRzwa tvAt na caturTI samApadyate
# shin-tu #  ring-ba # 'i phyir bzhi-pa #  la ni snyoms-pa # r mi 'jug go
tAm ca trizu dvIpezu asamaya vimuktaH eva arhan= utpAdayati
# de-yang #  gling gsum du dus dang mi sbyor-ba # r rnam-pa # r gro ba'i dgra-bcom-pa #  kho-na # s skyed-pa # r byed de
niHkleSa tvAt samADi vaSi tvAt ca
# nyon-mongs-pa-med-pa # 'i phyir dang ting-nge-'dzin-la-dbang #  pa'i phyir ro
dRzwi prAptasya yadi api tIkzNa indriya tvAt samADO vaSi tvam na tu nizkleSaH / samaya vimuktaH yadi api niHkleSaH na tu asya samADO vaSi tvam iti
# mthong-ba # s 'thob-pa #  ni gal-te #  dbang-po-rnon-po #  yin pa'i phyir ting-nge-'dzin-la-dbang #  ba yin yang nyon-mongs-pa-med-pa #  ni ma yin no / dus kyis rnam-par-grol-ba #  ni gal-te #  nyon-mongs-pa-med-pa #  yin yang
kena ASrayeNa kati DyAna ArupyAH saMmuKIkriyante / sva aDas BUmi ASrayAH eva
# ting-nge-'dzin-la-dbang #  ba ni ma yin no / rten gang-gis #  bsam-gtan #  dang gzugs-med-pa #  du zhig mngon gsum du byed ce na
DyAna ASrayAH eva
# bsam-gtan #  gzugs med rang dang ni
DyAna ArUpyAH / Bava agram Bava agre ca saMmuKIkriyate aDas ca yAvat kAmakAma DAtO / SezANi svasyAm BUmO= aDas ca iti
# 'og sa'i rten can srid-pa # 'i rtse mor yang mngon-sum-du #  byed la 'og ma 'dod-pa'i-khams #  kyi bar-du #  yang mngon-sum-du #  byed do / de-bzhin-du #  lhag-ma #  rnams kyang rang-gis #  dang sa-'og-ma # r mngon-sum-du #  byed do
kim kAraNam UrDva upapannaH na aDarAm samApatti saMmuKIkaroti / tasmAt tasya / vRTA aDaram
# ci'i-phyir #  gong-du #  skyes-pa #  snyoms-par-'jug-pa #  'og ma mngon-sum-du #  mi byed ce na / 'di-ltar #  de-la #  'og dgos med
nahi tasya aDareNa samApatti dravyeNa kiQcid prayojanam viDIyate / nihIna tvAt
# de-la #  ni snyoms-par-'jug-pa #  'og ma'i rdzas kyis cung-zad #  kyang dgos-pa #  mi byed de dman-pa # 'i phyir ro
utsarga kRtvA apavAdam karoti
# spyir bstan-pa #  byas-na # s dmigs kyis ston-pa # r byed de
AryA kiQcani asAMmuKyAt Bava agre tu Asrava kzayaH
# srid rtser 'phags-pa #  ci-yang #  med / mngon-sum #  byas-na # s zag-pa #  zad
Bava agre tu upapannasya anAsrava AkiQca nyAyatana saMmuKIBAvAt Asrava kzayaH Bavati
# 'phags-pa #  srid-pa # 'i rtse mor skyes-pa #  ni zag-pa-med-pa # 'i ci-yang-med-pa # 'i skye-mched #  mngon-sum-du-byas-nas #  zag-pa-zad-pa # r 'gyur ro
kaTam tatra upapannasya tad saMmuKIBAvaH / svasya aBAvAt tasya ca aByAsAt
# ji-ltar #  na der skyes-pa #  de mngon-sum-du #  byed ce na / rang-gi #  med-pa # 'i phyir dang de-yang #  nye-ba # 'i phyir ro
aTa ezAm DyAna ArUpyANAm kim Alambanam
# yang bsam-gtan #  dang gzugs-med-pa #  'di dag gi dmigs-pa #  ci-zhig #  yin zhe na
sa tRzNAH sva Bava AlambAH
# sred bcas rang-gi #  srid la dmigs
AsvAdana asaMprayuktAH sva BUmikam Bavam Alambante
# ro myang-ba #  dang mtshungs-pa # r ldan ba rnams ni rang-gis #  pa'i srid-pa #  la dmigs so
Bavaa grahaNena sa Asravam vastu gRhyate
# srid-pa #  smos-pa #  ni zag-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'i dngos-po #  gzung ngo
na aDaram Alambante vIta rAga tvAt na uttaram tRzNA pariCinna tvAt BUmInAm
# 'dod-chags-dang-bral-ba # 'i phyir 'og ma la yang mi dmigs so / sa rnams ni srid-pa # s yongs-su-bcad-pa # 'i phyir gong-ma #  la yang ma yin no
nAnA Asravam kuSala tva prasaFgAt iti
# dge-ba #  nyid-du #  thal-ba # r 'gyur-ba # 'i phyir zag-pa-med-pa #  la yang ma yin no
DyAnam sat vizayam SuBam / kuSalam DyAnam SuBa kamanA Asravam ca / tat sarva Alambanam yat kiQcid asti saMskRtam asaMskRtam vA
# bsam-gtan #  dge yul yod dgu yin / dge-ba # 'i bsam-gtan #  dag-pa #  dang / zag-pa-med-pa # 'i bsam-gtan #  de'i dmigs-pa #  ni 'dus byas sam 'dus-ma-byas #  gang-ci #  yod kyang rung-ba #  thams-cad #  yin no
na mOlAH kuSala arUpyAH sa Asrava aDara gocarAH
# gzugs mod dngos-gzhi #  dge rnams kyi / spyod yul zag bcas 'og ma min
mOlAnAm kuSala ArUpyANAm aDoBBUmikam sa Asravam vastu na Alambanam sva UrDva BUmi Alambana tvAt
# gzugs-med-pa # 'i dngos-gzhi #  dge-ba #  rnams kyi dmigs-pa #  ni sa-'og-ma-pa # 'i zag-pa-dang-bcas-pa # 'i dngos-po #  ma yin te / rang-gi #  sa pa dang sa-gong-ma #  la dmigs-pa # 'i phyir ro
anAsravam tu Alambanam / sarva anvaya jQAna pakzyaH na DarmDarma jQAna pakzaH na aDas BUmi niroDaH / sAmantaka anantaram ArgANAm tu aDarA BUmiH Alambanam / ezAm ca punar triviDAnAm DyAnAnAm rUpya ArUpyANAm / anAsraveNa hIyante kleSAH / na SudDakena / kutas eva klizwena / vIta rAga tvAt na aDas
# dmigs-pa #  zag-pa-med-pa #  ni rjes-su-shes-pa # 'i phyogs dang mthun-pa #  thams-cad #  yin gyi chos-shes-pa # 'i phyogs dang mthun-pa #  yang ma yin la sa-'og-ma # 'i 'gog-pa #  yang ma yin no / nyer-bsdogs #  kyi bar-chad-med-pa'i-lam #  rnams kyi dmigs-pa #  ni sa-'og-ma #  yin no / bsam-gtan #  dang gzugs-med-pa #  rnam-pa-gsum #  po 'di dag las / zag-pa-med-pa # s nyon-mongs-pa #  rnams spong ngo / dag-pa #  pas kyang mi spong na / nyon-mongs-pa-can #  gyis lta-smos #  kyang ci dgos te / 'dod-chags-dang-bral-ba # 'i phyir 'og ma la yang ma yin la
tasya eva tad apratipakza tvAt na sva BUmO
# de nyid de'i gnyen-po #  ma-yin-pa #  nyid kyi phyir rang-gi #  sa na yod-pa #  yang ma yin no
viSizwatara tvAt na UrDvam iti / samantakena ca
# ches khyad-par-du-'phags-pa # 'i phyir gong-ma #  yang ma yin no / nyer-bsdogs #  dag-pa # s kyang
DyAna ArUpya sAmantakena ca kleSAH prahIyante SudDakena api
# gzugs dang gzugs-med-pa # 'i nyer-bsdogs #  ni dag-pa #  pas kyang nyon-mongs-pa #  rnams spong ste
aDoBUmi pratipakza tvAt / kati punar sAmantakAni
# sa-'og-ma-pa # 'i gnyen-po #  yin pa'i phyir ro / nyer-bsdogs #  du zhig yod ce na
azwO sAmantakAni ezAm
# de-dag #  la ni nyer-bsdogs #  brgyad
ekEkasya ekEkam yena tad praveSaH
# re-re #  la gang-gis #  de-la #  'jug-pa #  re-re #  yod do
kim tAni api triviDAni taTA eva ca tezu vedanA / na iti ucyate
# ci de-dag #  kyang rnam-pa-gsum #  yin la de-dag #  la tshor-ba #  yang de-dang-'dra-ba # r yod dam zhe na / smras-pa # / ma yin te
SudDa aduHKa asuKAni hi
# dag-pa #  bde min sdug-bsngal #  min
SudDakAni ca tAni upekzA indriya saMprayuktAni ca yanta bAhya tvAt aDoBamI udvegAna pagamAt vErAgya paTa tvAt ca na AsvAdana asaMprayuktAni / Aryam ca Adyam

# 'di ni khyad-par #  yin te / de-dag #  gis ni rgyab-kyis-phyogs-pa #  tsam du zad la

# 'di dag gis ni dmigs-pa #  zil gyis gnon te / ji-ltar-'dod-pa #  bzhin-du #  mos-pa # 'i phyir dang nyon-mongs-pa #  mi-skye-ba # 'i phyir ro / zad-pa # r bcu'o / bar-chad-med-pa # r zad-pa # r rgyas-par-byed-pa # 'i phyir zad-par-gyi-skye-mched #  ni bcu ste
pRTivI ap tejaH vAyu nIla pIta lohita avadAta kRtsnAni / AkASa vijQAna AnantyAya Ayatana kRtsne ca / tezAm / aloBAzwO
# zad-pa # r sa dang chu-dang-me #  dang rlu [*rlung] dang sngon-po-dang-ser-po #  dang dmar-po #  dang dkar-po #  dang zad-pa # r nam-mkha' #  dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye-mched #  do / de rnams las

caturTaH eva DyAne / gocaraH punar / kAmAH

kAma avacara rUpa Ayatanam ezA mAlambanam

# kha-cig #  na re rlung gi ni reg-bya # 'i skye-mched #  yin no zhes zer ro / de gnyis ni gzugs med dag
dve paScime kRtsne SudDaka ArUpya svaBAve
# zad-par-gyi-skye-mched #  tha-ma #  gnyis ni gzugs-med-pa #  dag-pa #  pa'i rang-bzhin #  dag yin no
sva catur skanDa gocare
# spyod yul rang-gi #  phung-po #  bzhi
sva BUmikAH catvAraH skanDAH anyoH Alambanam / vimokza prAveSikAni aBiBva AyatanAni / aBiBvAya tana prAveSikAni kRtsna AyatanAni / uttara uttara viSizwa tvAt / sarvANi ca etAni vimokza AdIni pRTagjana Arya sAMtAnikAni sTApayitvA niroDa vimokzam
# 'di gnyis kyi dmigs-pa #  ni rang-gis #  pa'i phung-po #  bzhi yin no / zil-gyis-gnon-pa # 'i skye-mched #  rnams ni rnam-par-thar-pa #  'jug-pa #  las byung-ba #  can yin la / zad-par-gyi-skye-mched #  rnams ni zil-gyis-gnon-pa # 'i skye-mched #  'jug-pa #  las byung-ba #  can yin te / gong-nas-gong-du #  khyad bar-du #  'phags-pa # 'i phyir ro / 'gog-pa # 'i rnam-par-thar-pa #  ma-gtogs-pa #  rnam-pa # r thar ba la-sogs-pa #  de-dag #  thams-cad #  ni so-so'i-skye-bo #  dang 'phags-pa # 'i rgyud-la-yod-pa #  dag yin no / ci rnam-par-thar-pa #  la-sogs-pa #  de-dag #  sbyor-ba-las-byung-ba #  yin nam 'dod-chags-dang-bral-ba # s thob-pa #  yin zhes-bya-ba # 'i 'dri-ba #  'di-la #  'gog ba bshad-zin #
niroDaH uktaH / niroDa vimokzaH pUrvam eva uktaH sarvEH prakArEH
# 'gog-pa # 'i rnam-par-thar-pa #  ni sngar rnam-pa-thams-cad-du #  bshad-zin #  to / lhag-ma #  ni
vErAgya prayoga Aptam tu Sezitam / niroDAt anyAni vimokza AdIni vErAgya lABAni prAyogikANi ca / ucita anucita tvAt
# 'dod-chags #  bral dang sbyor-ba # s 'thob / 'gog-pa #  las gzhan-pa # 'i rnam-par-thar-pa #  la-sogs-pa #  ni 'dod-chags-dang-bral-ba # s thob-pa #  yang yin la sbyor-ba-las-byung-ba #  dag kyang yin te / 'dris-pa #  dang ma-'dris-pa # 'i phyir ro
triDA tva ASraya mArUpya saMjQam Sezam manuzya jam
# gzugs med ces bya khams-gsum #  gyi / rten can lhag-ma #  mi las skye
Arupya vimokzAH Arupya kRtsne ca trEDAtuka ASrayANi Sezam manuzya ASrayam eva
# gzugs-med-pa # 'i rnam-par-thar-pa #  dang gzugs-med-pa # 'i zad-pa # r ni khams-gsum-pa # 'i rten can dag yin no / lhag-ma #  ni mi'i rten can kho-na #  yin te
upadeSa sAmarTyena utpAdanAt
# lung gi mthus skyed-pa # 'i phyir ro
kaTam rUpAH upya DAtvoH ArUpya DyAna viSeza utpAdanam
# ji-ltar #  na gzugs dang gzugs-med-pa'i-khams #  dag tu gzugs-med-pa #  dang bsam-gtan #  gyi khyad-par #  skye zhe na
triBiH kAraNEH DyAna ArUpya samApattInAm upapattiH hetu karma Darma tA balEH / tatra
# rgyu dang las dang chos-nyid #  dang / rgyu gsum gyis bsam-gtan #  dang gzugs-med-pa # 'i snyoms-pa # r 'jug ba rnams skye ste / de-la #
hetu karma balAt DAtvoH ArUpya utpAdanam dvayoH
# khams gnyis dag tu gzugs-med-pa # / rgyu dang las kyi stobs kyis te
dvayoH rUpa ArUpya DAtvoH ArUpya samApatti utpAdanam / hetu balAt Asan= ABIkzNa aByAsAt karma balAt ca UrDva BUmikasya apara paryAya vedanIyasya karmaNaH pratyupasTita vipAka tvAt
# gzugs dang gzugs-med-pa'i-khams #  dag tu gzugs-med-pa # 'i snyoms-par-'jug-pa #  skye-ba #  rgyu'i-stobs #  kyis ni nye-ba #  dang yang-dang-yang-du #  goms-pa #  la sa so / las kyi stobs kyis ni sa-gong-ma # 'i lan-grangs-gzhan-la #  myong-bar-'gyur-ba # 'i las kyi rnam-par-smin-pa #  nye-bar-gnas-pa # 'i phyir te
na hi aDastAt avIta rAgeNa UrDva Sakyam utpattum iti / DyAnAnAm rUpaDAtO tu tAByAm DarmatayA api ca
# 'og ma las 'dod-chags #  dang ma-bral-ba # s ni gong-du #  skye-ba # r mi nus so / gzugs-kyi-khams #  su bsam-gtan #  rnams / de-dag #  dang chos-nyid-kyis #  kyang
rUpaDAtO DyAna utpAdanam etAByAm hetu karma balAByAm Darma tayA ca saMvartanI kAle
# gzugs-kyi-khams #  su ni bsam-gtan #  gzhan rgyu dang las kyi stobs de-dag #  dang chos-nyid-kyis #  kyang skye ste / 'jig-pa # 'i tshe lta-bu # 'o
tadAnIm hi sarva sattvAH eva aDara BUmikAH tat DyAnam utpAdayanti / kRtsnAnAm DarmANAm udBUta vRtti tvAt / kiyat ciram punar ayam sadDarmaH sTAsyati / yatra ime IdRSAnAm DarmANAm prakArAH prajQAyante / sadDarmaH dviviDaH SAstuH Agama aDigama AtmakaH / tatra AgamaH sUtra vinaya aBiDarmAH aDigamaH boDi pakzyAH iti eza dviviDaH sadDarmaH / DAtAraH tasya vaktAraH pratipattAraH eva ca / Agamasya hi DArayitAraH vaktAraH / aDigamasya pratipattAraH
# de'i tshe ni sa-'og-ma-pa # 'i sems-can-thams-cad #  dge-ba'i-chos #  rnams kyi 'jug-pa #  shas-che-ba #  nyid kyi phyir bsam-gtan #  de skyed-pa # r byed do / gang-la #  chos-rnams #  kyi rnam-pa #  ni du yod / 'di-lta-bu # 'i mngon-pa # 'i chos 'di ji-srid #  du gnas she na / ston-pa # 'i dam chos rnam gnyis te / lung dang rtogs-pa # 'i bdag-nyid #  do / de-la #  lung ni mdo-sde #  dang 'dul-ba #  dang chos-mngon-pa #  rnams so / rtogs ba ni byang-chub-kyi-phyogs #  dang mthun-pa #  rnams te / de-ltar-na #  dam-pa'i-chos #  'di ni rnam-pa-gnyis #  yin no / de 'dzin byed-pa #  smra byed dang / sgrub-par-byed-pa #  khon yin / lung 'dzin-par-byed-pa #  ni smra-bar-byed-pa #  yin no / rtogs-pa #  'dzin-par-byed-pa #  ni sgrub-par-byed-pa #  yan te
atas yAvat ete sTAsyanti tAvat sat DarmaH iti veditavyam
# de'i-phyir #  de nyid ji-srid #  du gnas-pa #  de srid du dam-pa'i-chos #  gnas-pa # r rig-par-bya # 'o
tezAm tu varza sahasra mavasTAnam AhuH
# de-dag #  kyang lo stong du gnas so zhes bshad do
aDigamasya evam / Agamasya tu BUyAMsam kAlam iti apare / yaH ayam iha SAstre aBiDarmaH uktaH kim ezaH eva SAstra aBiDarmaH deSitaH / kASmIra vEBAzika nIti sidDaH prAyas mayA ayam kaTitaH aBiDarmaH
# gzhan dag na re rtogs-pa #  ni de-lta-bu #  yin gyi / lung ni yun-ring-du #  gnas so zhes zer ro / ci bstan-bcos #  'dir chos-mngon-pa #  bshad-pa #  gang-yin-pa # 'i chos-mngon-pa #  'di nyid ston-pa # s bshad dam zhe na / bdag-gis #  mngon-pa # 'i chos 'di phal-cher #  ni / kha che bye-brag #  smra-ba # 'i tshul grub bshad
yad durgRhItam tat iha asmad AgaH sat Darma nItO manayaH pramANam
# nyes-pa # r zin gang de 'dir bdag-gis #  nyes / dam chos tshul la tshad-ma #  thub rnams yin
prAyeNa hi kASmIra vEBAzikANAm nIti Adi sidDaH ezaH asmABiH abiDarmaH AKyAtaH / yat atra asmABiH durgRhItam saH asmAkam aparADaH / sadDarma nItO tu punar budDAH eva pramANam budDa putrAH ca
# bdag-gis #  chos-mngon-pa #  'di phal-cher #  kha che bye-brag #  tu smra-ba #  rnams kyi tshul du grub-pa # r bshad-pa #  yin no / 'di-la #  bdag-gis #  nyes-pa # r zin-pa #  gang-yin-pa #  de ni bdag-gis #  nyes-pa #  yin te / dam-pa'i-chos-kyi-tshul #  la ni sangs-rgyas #  rnams 'khon dang sangs-rgyas #  kyi sras rnams tshad-ma #  yin no
nimIlite SAstari loka cakzuzi kzayam gate sAkzi jane ca BUyasA
# ston-pa #  'jig-rten #  mig ni zum gyur cing / dbang gyur skye-bo #  phal-cher #  zad-pa #  na
adRzwa tattvEH niravagrahEH kRtam kutArkikEH SAsanam etat Akulam / gate aTa SAntim paramAm svayaMBuvi svayaMBuvaH SAsana DurDarezu ca
# de nyid ma mthong rang-dgar #  gyur ba yi / ngan rtog rnams kyis bstan-pa #  'di dkrugs so / rang byung rang byung bstan-pa #  gces 'dzin rnams / mchog-tu #  zhir gshegs 'gro mgon-med-pa #  na
jagati anATe guna GAtiBiH matEH niraFkuSEH svEram iha adya caryate
# 'doms med yon-tan #  'joms bar byed-pa #  yi / dri-ma # s dga'-mgur #  deng sang 'di na spyod
iti kaNWa gata prANam viditvA SAsanam muneH
# de-ltar #  thub-pa #  dag gi bstan-pa #  ni / lkog-ma # r srog phyin 'dra dang dri-ma #  rnams
bala kAlam malAnAm ca na pramAdyam mumukzuBiH / navamam koSa sTAnam / namaH budDAya
# stobs-dang-ldan-pa # 'i dus-su #  rig-nas #  ni / thar-pa #  'dod bdag-gis #  bag yod gyis [*kyis] / chos-mngon-pa # 'i mdzod kyi bshad-pa #  las snyoms-pa # r 'dug-pa #  bstan-pa #  zhes-bya-ba #  mdzod kyi gnas brgyad pa'o
kim Kalu atas anyatra mokzaH na asti / na asti / kim kAraNam
# yang ci 'di-las #  gzhan la thar-pa #  yod dam zhe na / med do / ci'i-phyir #  zhe na
vitaTa Atma dRzwi nivizwa tvAt
# bdag-tu-lta-ba #  phyin-ci-log #  la zhen-pa #  nyid kyi phyir te
nahi te skanDa saMtAnaH eva Atma prajQaptim vyavasyanti / kim tarhi
# phung-po # 'i rgyud kho-na #  la bdag tu 'dogs-pa #  ni nges-par #  mi 'dzin to / 'o na ci zhe na
dravya antaram eva AtmAnam parikalpayanti Atma grAha praBavAH ca sasarva kleSAH iti
# rdzas gzhan kho-na #  la bdag tu yongs su rtogs-pa # r byed la / nyon-mongs-pa #  rnams ni bdag-tu-'dzin-pa #  las rab-tu-skye-ba #  yin no
kaTam punar idam gamyate skanDa saMtAnaH eva idam Atma aBiDAnam vartate na anyasmin= aBiDeyaH iti / pratyakza anumAna aBAvAt
# bdag tu mngon-par-brjod-pa #  'di ni phung-po # 'i rgyud kho-na #  la 'jug gi / brjod-par-bya-ba #  gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes-bya-ba #  'di ji-ltar #  khong du chud ce na
ye hi DarmAH santi tezAm pratyakzam upalabDiH Bavati asati antarAye
# mngon-sum #  dang rjes-su-dpag-pa #  med-pa # 'i phyir te / chos gang dag yod-pa #  de-dag #  ni bar-chad-byed-pa #  med na mngon-sum-du #  dmigs-pa #  yin te
tat yaTA zaNNAm vizayANAm manasaH ca / anumAnam ca / tat yaTA paQcAnAm indriyANAm
# dper-na #  yul drug dang yid lta-bu # 'o / yang-na #  rjes-su-dpag-pa # s dmigs-pa #  yin te / dper-na #  dbang-po #  lta-bu # 'o
tatra idam anumAnam / sati kAraNe kAraNa antarasya aBAve kAryasya aBAvaH dRzwaH BAve ca punar BAviH tat yaTA aFkurasya / sati eva ca ABAsa prApte vizaye manaskAre ca kAraNe vizaya grahaNasya aBAvaH dRzwaH punar ca BAvaH anDa vaDiH AdInAm ananta avaDiH AdInAm ca / atas tatra api kAraNa antarasya aBAvaH BAvaH ca niScIyate
# de-la #  'di ni rjes-su-dpag-pa #  yin te / rgyu yod kyang rgyu gzhan med na 'bras-bu-med-pa # r mthong la yod-na #  ni yang yod-pa # r mthong-ba #  ste / dper-na #  myu-gu #  lta-bu # 'o / yul-snang-bar-gyur-pa #  dang rgyu yid-la-byed-pa #  yod kyang yul 'dzin-pa #  med-pa # r mthong la / yang yod-pa # r mthong-ba #  ste / long-ba #  dang 'on-pa #  la-sogs-pa #  dang ma long-ba #  dang ma 'on-pa #  la-sogs-pa #  lta-bu # 'o / de'i-phyir #  de-la #  yang rgyu gzhan med-pa #  dang yod-pa # r nges la
yat ca tad kAraNa antaram tat indriyam iti etat anumAnam / na ca evam AtmanaH asti iti na asti AtmA
# rgyu gzhan gang yin bde ni dbang-po #  yin no zhes-bya-ba #  'di ni rjes-su-dpag-pa #  yin no / bdag ni de-ltar #  yod-pa-ma-yin-pa # s bdag med do
yat trhi vAtsIputriyAH pudgalam santim icCanti / vicAryam tAvat etat
# 'o na gang gnas-ma # 'i bu rnams gang-zag #  yod-pa # r 'dod-pa #  ji-lta-bu # / 'di ni re-zhig #  dpyad-pa # r bya-ba #  yin te
kim te dravyataH icCanti Ahosvit prajQaptitaH / kim ca idam dravyataH iti kim vA prajQaptitaH
# ci de-dag #  rdzas su 'dod dam / 'on te btags-pa # r 'dod / rdzas su zhes-bya-ba #  'di yang ci-yang #  ci-zhig # / btags-pa # r zhes-bya-ba #  'di yang ci-zhig #  yin
rUpa Adi vat BAva antaram ced dravyataH
# gal-te #  gzugs la-sogs-pa #  bzhin-du #  dngos-po #  gzhan zhig yin no zhe na ni rdzas-su-yod-pa #  yin no
kzIra Adi vat samudAyaH ced prajQaptitaH / kim ca atas
# gal-te #  'o-ma #  la-sogs-pa #  bzhin-du #  spyi yin no zhe na ni btags-pa # r yod-pa #  yin no / de-la # s cir 'gyur
yadi tAvat dravyataH / saMBinna svaBAva tvAt skanDeByaH anyaH vaktavyaH itaretara skanDa vat / kAraNam ca asya vaktavyam / asaMskRtaH vA
# re-zhig #  gal-te #  rdzas su yod-na #  ni de rang-bzhin #  tha-dad-pa # 'i phyir phung-po #  rnams las gzhan no zhes brjod-pa # r bya ste / phan tshun gyi phung-po #  bzhin no / 'di'i rgyu yang brjod dgos so
atas tIrTika dRzwi prasaFgaH nizprayojana tvam ca / aTa prajQaptitaH / vayam api evam trUmaH / na eva hi dravyataH asti na api prajQaptitaH / kim tarhi / ADyAtmika anupAttAn varttamAnAn skanDa anupAdAya pudgalaH prajQapyate
# 'on te 'dus-ma-byas #  yin na ni de'i-phyir #  mu-stegs-can #  gyi lta-ba # r yang thal-ba # r 'gyur la / dgos-pa-med-pa #  nyid-du #  yang 'gyur ro / 'on te btags-pa # r yod do zhe na ni kho bo cag kyang de-skad #  ces smras so / de ni rdzas-su-yod-pa #  kho-na #  yang ma yin la btags-pa # r yod-pa #  yang ma yin no / 'o na ci zhe na / da-ltar #  gyi nang gi zin-pa # 'i phung-po #  rnams rgyur byas-na # s gang-zag #  tu 'dogs so
tat idam anDa vacanam anunmIlita arTam na buDyAmahe / kim idam upAdAya iti
# long-ba #  lta-bu # 'i tshig don mi-gsal-ba #  'di ni mi go'o / rgyur byas-na # s zhes-bya-ba #  'di ci
yadi ayam arhataH skanDAnAm lakzyate tezu eva pudgala prajQaptiH prApnoti
# gal-te #  'di'i don phung-po #  rnams la dmigs nas zhes-bya-ba #  'di yin no zhe na ni / de-dag #  kho-na #  la gang-zag #  tu 'dogs-pa # r zad do
yaTA rUpa AdIn Alamvya tezu eva kzIra prajQaptiH
# dper-na #  gzugs la-sogs-pa #  la dmigs nas / de-dag #  kho-na #  la 'o-ma #  'dogs-pa #  bzhin no
aTa ayam arTaH skanDAn pratIya iti / skanDAnAm pudgala prajQapti kAraNa tvAt / saH eva dozaH / na saH evam prajQapyate / kaTam tarhi yaTenDanam upAdAya agniH
# 'on te 'di'i don phung-po #  rnams la brten-nas #  zhes-bya-ba #  'di yin no zhe na ni phung-po #  rnams gang-zag-gdags-pa # 'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir skyon de nyid-du #  'gyur ro / de ni de-ltar #  mi 'dogs so / 'o na ji-lta-bu #  zhe na / ji-ltar #  bud-shing #  rgyur byas-na # s me 'dogs-pa #  bzhin no
kaTam ca inDanam upAdAya agniH prajQapyate / na hi vinenDanena agniH prajQapyate na ca anyaH inDanAt agniH Sakyate prajQapayitum na api ananyaH
# ji-ltar #  na bud-shing #  rgyur byas-na # s me 'dogs she na / bud-shing #  med-pa # r me mi 'dogs mod kyi / bud-shing #  las me gzhan yin par dam-bca'-ba # r yang mi nus la / gzhan ma-yin-pa # r dam-bca'-ba # r yang mi nus te
yadi hAnyaH syAt anuzNam inDanam syAt
# gal-te #  gzhan yin na ni bud-shing #  dro-ba #  nyid ma yin bar 'gyur ro
aTa ananyaH syAt dAhyam eva dAhakam syAt
# 'on te gzhan ma yin na ni bsreg-bya #  nyid sreg byed yin par 'gyur ro
evam na ca vinA skanvEH pudgalaH prajQapyate
# de-ltar #  phung-po #  rnams med-pa # r yang gang-zag #  mi 'dogs la
na ca anyaH skanDeByaH Sakyate pratijQAtum SASvata prasaFgAt
# phung-po #  rnams las gzhan yin par dam-bca'-ba # r yang mi nus te rtag-par #  thal-ba # r 'gyur ro
na api ananyaH ucCeda prasaFgat iti / aFga tAvat brUhi kiginDanam kaH anniH iti
# gzhan ma-yin-pa # r yang dam-bca'-ba # r mi nus te chad-pa # r thal-ba # r 'gyur ro / re-zhig #  kye bud-shing #  ni ci
tatas jQAsyAmaH kaTam inDanam upAdAya agniH prajQapyate iti
# me ni ci yin pa smros-shig #  dang de-la # s ji-ltar #  na bud-shing #  rgyur byas-na # s me 'dogs-pa # r shes-pa # r bya'o
kim atra vaktavyam dAhyam inDanam dAhakaH agniH
# 'di-la #  ci-zhig #  brjod-pa # r bya / bsreg-bya #  ni bud-shing #  yin la sreg byed ni me yin par zad mod
etat eva atra vaktavyam kim dAhyam kok dAhakaH iti
# 'dir bsreg bar bya-ba #  ni ci / sreg-par-byed-pa #  ni ci yin pa de nyid brjod-pa # r bya'o
loke hi tAvat apradIptam kAzwHAdikam inDanam ucyate dAhyam ca
# re-zhig #  'jig-rten #  na ni shing la sogs ba ma 'bar-ba #  la bud-shing #  zhes kyang bya la bsreg-bya #  zhes kyang bya'o
pradIptam agniH dAhakaH ca
# 'bar-ba #  la ni me zhes kyang bya la sreg byed ces kyang bya ste
yat ca Basvaram ca uzNam ca BRSam ca tena hi tat iDyate Dyate ca
# 'bar-ba #  dang shin-tu-tsha-ba #  gang-yin-pa #  des de tshig-pa #  dang sreg-pa # r byed de
saMtati vikAra apAdAnAt
